81b6(mdo 'grel): spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu
82a1(mdo 'grel): byin pa la mi spyod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma spyod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
82a2(mdo 'grel): pa la mi spyod do// phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par bya ba'i don du shes rab
82a3(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
82a4(mdo 'grel): brgyad kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod// rlung stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab
82a5(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi sod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi
82a6(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi don
82b1(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// dor du med pa stong pa nyid bye don du shes rangab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga mi spyod do// rang bzhin snang ba
82b2(mdo 'grel): kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo mi spyod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// mi dmigs
82b3(mdo 'grel): pa stong pa nyid kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rolal tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do//
82b4(mdo 'grel): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de bzhin nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// chos kyi dbyings kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyodado// /
82b5(mdo 'grel): yang dag pa'i mtha'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ chos gang la yang tha dad par yang dag par rje su mi
82b6(mdo 'grel): mthong ngo // shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ lha'i mig gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// lha'i rna ba'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
83a1(mdo 'grel): pa la mi spyod do// gzhan gyi sems shes pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// sngon gyi gnas rje su dran pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// rdzu 'phrul sgrub pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol
83a2(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// zag pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjesasu
83a3(mdo 'grel): mi mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' lha gang zhig mngon par shes pa thams cad lha gang las yin/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni brtson zhes brjod par bya'o// shA ri'i
83a4(mdo 'grel): bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam du bdag gis lha'i mig gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi
83a5(mdo 'grel): 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o snyam du semaso// lha'i rna bas de dag gi sgra thos par bya'o// de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o// de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjesu dran nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam
83a6(mdo 'grel): du mi sems so// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gis lha'i mig gis lce phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba
83b1(mdo 'grel): dang skye ba shes par bya'o// lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o// de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o// de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjesu dran nas rdzu 'phral gyis seng ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi snyem so//
83b2(mdo 'grel): shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gis nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyes rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o// lha'i rna bas de
83b3(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o// de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o// de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rje su dran nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi semaso// sh+lo ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems
83b4(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag kI lha'i mig gi byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung go bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o// lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o//
83b5(mdo 'grel): de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o// de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rje su dran nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi semaso// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di
83b6(mdo 'grel): snyam du bdag gis lha'i mig gis byang shar gyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o// !'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o// de dag
84a1(mdo 'grel): nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o// de dag nyid kyi ston gyi gnas rje su dran nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di
84a2(mdo 'grel): snyam du bdag gis lha'i mig gis shar lho'i phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sems cad rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o// lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o// de dag nyid kyi sems
84a3(mdo 'grel): sems kyis shes par bya'o// de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rje su dran nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi semaso// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gis lha'i mig
84a4(mdo 'grel): gis lho nub kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o// lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o// de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o//
84a5(mdo 'grel): de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rje su dran nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi semaso// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gis lha'i mig gis nub byang gA phyogs kyi
84a6(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o// lha'i rna bas ngo rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o// de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o// de dag nyid kyi skyon
84b1(mdo 'grel): gyi gnas rje su dran nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi semaso// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gi lha'i mig gis 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA
84b2(mdo 'grel): kruklung gi bye ma skyed rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o// lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o// de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o// de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rje su dran nas rdzu
84b3(mdo 'grel): 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi semaso// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gis lha'i mig gis steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi
84b4(mdo 'grel): sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o// lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o// de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o// de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjesu dran nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par
84b5(mdo 'grel): bya'o snyam du mi semaso// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni sems can gzhal du med grangs med tshad med pa rnams yongasu mya ngan las zlo bar byed par brtson pa yino zhes
84b6(mdo 'grel): brjod par bya'o// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// 'di'i 'jig rten pa'i nyon mongs pa gang ji snyed yod pa
85a1(mdo 'grel): pa de dag thams cad kyang rab tu gsal bar 'gyuro// shA rI'i bu shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i brang gi bye ma skyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji skad cig bzhugs shing sbyong ba rnams dang /
85a2(mdo 'grel): de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang
85a3(mdo 'grel): byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams
85a4(mdo 'grel): skyes dang / 'bras bu che dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang / mi spong ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / legs mthong dang / rab lta dang / 'o na min gyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la
85a5(mdo 'grel): lo la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongasu srung bar byed do// de la lus kyi skyon gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
85a6(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po ngos sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bu lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing
85b1(mdo 'grel): 'tsho skyong ba dang / de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang
85b2(mdo 'grel): byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang /
85b3(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu che ba dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang / mi spong ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / legs mthong dang / rab lha dang / 'og min gyi lha gung yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lnga la la zhig bar chod
85b4(mdo 'grel): byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongasu bsrung bar byed do// de la lus kyi skyon gang dag yod pa dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa kho nar 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des
85b5(mdo 'grel): sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyiraro// shA ri'i bu nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang
85b6(mdo 'grel): de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang
86a1(mdo 'grel): byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / 'dra chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'du gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dag dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin mod
86a2(mdo 'grel): dang bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang / mi spong ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / legs mthong dang / rab lha dang / 'og min gyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems
86a3(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po de la laM la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongasu bsrung bar byed do// de lnga lus kyi skyon gung dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang
86a4(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir// shA ri'i bu byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji
86a5(mdo 'grel): snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang / de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan
86a6(mdo 'grel): dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhon 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge
86b1(mdo 'grel): rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che drung / 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang / mi spong ba dang // mi gdung ba dang / legs mthong dang / rab lta dang / 'gu min gyi lha gang yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'
86b2(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongasu bsrung bar byed do// de la lus kyi skyon du bya ba gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
86b3(mdo 'grel): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bu byang shar gyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom
86b4(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang / de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang // rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi pa nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha gang yin pa de
86b5(mdo 'grel): dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chud byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongasasu bsrung bar byed do// de la lus kyi skyon du bya ba gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang
86b6(mdo 'grel): ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bu shar lho'i phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
87a1(mdo 'grel): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang / de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rgyal
87a2(mdo 'grel): chen ris bzhi pa nas 'og min gyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongasasu bsrung bar byed do// de la lus kyi skyon du bya ba gang dag yod
87a3(mdo 'grel): pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyiraro// shA ri'i bu lho nub kyi
87a4(mdo 'grel): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang / de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas gang dag
87a5(mdo 'grel): yin pa rnams dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi pa nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha gang yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongasu bsrung bar byed do// de lta
87a6(mdo 'grel): lus kyi skyon gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i
87b1(mdo 'grel): phyir ro// shA ri'i bu nub byung gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang / de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rang
87b2(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi pa nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha gang yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongasu bsrung
87b3(mdo 'grel): bar byed do// de la lus kyi skyon gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas
87b4(mdo 'grel): khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bu 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang / de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa
87b5(mdo 'grel): rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi pa nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la lo la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs
87b6(mdo 'grel): bsrung bar byed do// de la lus kyi skyon gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams
88a1(mdo 'grel): pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bu steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang / de dag
88a2(mdo 'grel): gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams drang / rgyal chen ris bzhi pa nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la
88a3(mdo 'grel): zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yong su bsrung bar byed do// de la lus kyi skyon gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
88a4(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la ni tshogs chung ngus gzungs
88a5(mdo 'grel): kyi sgo dang tingange 'dzin gyi sgo rnams mngon du 'gyur ro// skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag
88a6(mdo 'grel): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
88b1(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni brtson zhes brjod par bya'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la ni 'di snyam du gang zhig chos rnams dang lhan cig ldan pa 'am/ bral
88b2(mdo 'grel): pa 'am/ 'du ba 'am/ dbye ba'i chos 'ga' zhig yod do zhes sems par byed pa med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang zhig ldan pa 'am/ bral ba 'am/ 'du ba 'am/ dbye ba'i chos nyid yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo // shA ri'i
88b3(mdo 'grel): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes brjod par bya'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la
88b4(mdo 'grel): ni 'di snyam du shin tu myur bar chos kyi dbyings mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ram/ 'on tam mi 'gyur zhes bya bar sems pa med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings mngon par sangs rgyas pa
88b5(mdo 'grel): med do// mngon par 'tshang rgya ba med do// mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba med do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni brtson zhes brjod par bya'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan
88b6(mdo 'grel): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'ga' yang chos kyi dbyings las tha dad par yang dag par rje su mi mthong zhing chos kyi dbyings la chos sna tshog su yang 'byed par mi byed la/
89a1(mdo 'grel): de 'di snyam du chos kyi dbyings 'di yang 'di ltar rtogs sam mi rtogs snyam du sems pa yang med/ 'di ltar chos gang gis chos de dag rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos 'gru' yang des yang dag pa/ d+ha sunA nA
89a2(mdo 'grel): ba med do// 'di ltar nges ni chos kyi dbyings la stong pa'o zhes sbyor bar mi byed mi stong ngo zhes sbyor bar mi byed do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes brjod
89a3(mdo 'grel): bar bya'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mig gi khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed// stong pa nyid la mig gi khums kyis sbyor bar mi
89a4(mdo 'grel): byed do// gzugs kyi khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong ba nyid la gzugs kyi khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do// mig gi rnams par shes pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la mig gi
89a5(mdo 'grel): rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed// rna ba'i khams stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong po nyid la rna ba'i khams kyis skyer bar mi byed do// skra'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la sgra'i
89a6(mdo 'grel): khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do// sna'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/
89b1(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid la sna'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do// dri'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la dri'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid
89b2(mdo 'grel): la sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do// lce'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la lce'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do// ro'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la ro'i
89b3(mdo 'grel): khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do// lus kyi khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/
89b4(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid la lus kyi khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do// reg bya'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la reg bya'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi
89b5(mdo 'grel): byed/ stong pa nyid la lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do// yid kyi khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la yid kyi khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do// chos kyi khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor
89b6(mdo 'grel): par mi byed/ stong pa nyid la chos kyi khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
90a1(mdo 'grel): shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnal 'byor dam pa yin te/ 'di lta ste stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor ro// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa ni nyan thos kyi sa
90a2(mdo 'grel): 'am rlung sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// sems can yongasu smin par byed do// myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bor yang 'gyur ro//
90a3(mdo 'grel): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnal 'byor du bya ba gang ji snyed pa de dag gi nang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor ni rab ces bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o// mchog dang / rab mchog dang / tha
90a4(mdo 'grel): ma dang / bla na med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / gya nom pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu rnal 'byor 'di ni bla na med pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor ni stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor dang /
90a5(mdo 'grel): mtshan ma med pa'i rnal 'byor dang smon pa med pa'i rnal 'byor ro// shA ri'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lung du bstan pa dang nye bar gyur pa yino// shA ri'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
90a6(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po ni sems can gzhal du med grangs med pa rnams kyi don byed par 'gyur yang 'di snyam du bdag la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams lung ston par 'gyur/ bdag ni lung bstan pa la nye bar gyur to// bdag gis ni
90b1(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu spyod bAr 'gyuraro// bdag gis ni sems can rnams yongasu smin par bya'o// bdag gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
90b2(mdo 'grel): bar bya'o snyam du mi semaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de chos kyi dbyings la rnam par bral bar mi byed cing gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'am/ gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi lung bstan par bya ba'i
90b3(mdo 'grel): chos kyi dbyings las gzhan pa'i chos kyang yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can gyi 'du shes mi skye'o// /
90b4(mdo 'grel): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir sems can shin du skye ba med cing 'gag pa med do// gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
90b5(mdo 'grel): par yang ji ltar 'gyur/ shA ri'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can skye ba med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
90b6(mdo 'grel): phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can mi dmig pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can dben pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
91a1(mdo 'grel): xxx
91a2(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po ni byams pa chen po mngon par sgrub 'o// rje rnon po mngon par sgrub // sa sku 'i sems mi bskyed do// tshu ga khrims ngan pa'i sems mi bskyed do// gnod po'i sems mi bskyed/ li mo'i sems myi bskyed/
91a3(mdo 'grel): rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems mi bskyed/ shes rab 'chil ba'i sems mi bskyed do zhes bya ba ni chos dkon mchog la gdamaso pa'o// / de skad ces bka' stsal po dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
91a4(mdo 'grel): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gong shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa 'dis gnas pa de gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa lags/ 'di na sa shi 'phos nas ni glang du skye bar 'gyur
91a5(mdo 'grel): de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA rI'i bu lnga 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa 'dis gnas pa 'don
91a6(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos te 'dir skye ba 'am/ dge' ldan gyi lha'i ris dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nyid nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' brgyad pa'o// // shA ri'i bu de
91b1(mdo 'grel): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mi'i nang na shi 'phos nas mi drang skal ba mnyam pa nyid du skyes pa de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma gtogs par dbang po rtul po yin te/ shes rab
91b2(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la yang myur du mnyam par gzhog pa ma yin te/ de la gzungs kyi sgo dang / tinge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang myur du mngon du mi 'gyuraro// shA ri'i bu gang khyod kyis 'di skad ces byang chub sems dpa' sems
91b3(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di la snyoms par 'jug pa de 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
91b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i rnal 'byor 'di la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shi 'phos nas grang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing der sangs rgyas bco
91b5(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur te/ nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyuraro zhes bya ba ni/
91b6(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' dad pas rje su 'brang ba'o// // shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos te/ 'dir skyes pa de'i dbang po rnams rno bar myur du rnal 'byor
92a1(mdo 'grel): 'di 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor ro// skye ba brjes kyang de la chos zab mo zab mo dag mngon du phyogs par 'gyur te/ des phyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la
92a2(mdo 'grel): snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur// gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
92a3(mdo 'grel): dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa de yang dbang po shin tu rno bar 'gyur zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug la nyams pa med pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad kyang mngon du phyogs par 'gyur ro zhes
92a4(mdo 'grel): bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rje su 'brang ba'o// // shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyor ba la brtson par byed pa na/ sems can yongasu
92a5(mdo 'grel): sbyin par bya ba'i phyir thabs la mkhas pa'i stobs kyis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas kyang des nga rgyal du mi byed pa dag yod do zhes bya ba ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o// // brgya po lnga bu// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
92a6(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mi mkhas pa gang dag bsam gtan bzhi po rnams sgrub par byed cing / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la spyod par byed cing bsam gtan thob pa des kyang lha tshe ring po rnamasu skyes te/ de nas shi 'phos nas de
92b1(mdo 'grel): gal te 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dang mi rnams skye zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par 'gyur ba ni/ de dag gi dbang po rnams rtul por 'gyur zhing rnon por mi 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
92b2(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bsam gtan la yang mnyam par gzhog la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang spyod de/ de dag thabs la mi mkhas pa bsam gtan rnams spangs nas phyir 'dod pa'i kham su skye ba yod de/ shA ri'i bu
92b3(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang dbang po rtul ba yin te/ dbang po rno ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu gnyis pa dang gsum pa la zhugs pa dad pas rjesu 'brang ba yin no// // shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
92b4(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi po rnams bskyed de/ tshad med pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
92b5(mdo 'grel): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug cing / bsam gtan gyi dbang dang / tshad med pa'i dbang dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis
92b6(mdo 'grel): mi skye bar snying rje chen po can thabs mkhas pas gang du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par skye ba yang yod de/ de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang ma
93a1(mdo 'grel): bral bas bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya'o zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu gnyis pa dang gsum pa la zhugs pa mthong bas thob pa'o// /
93a2(mdo 'grel): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i
93a3(mdo 'grel): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams sgom par byed/ stong pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin la snyoms par
93a4(mdo 'grel): 'jug par byed/ mtshan ma med pa'i ti nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par byed/ smon pa med pa'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par byed cing / de dag gi dbang du mi 'gro bar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa rnams mnyes par
93a5(mdo 'grel): byas nas des tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/ slar yang dga' ldan gyi lha dang skal ba mnyam par skye ste/ de dag der tshe ji srid du gnas nas dbang po ma nyams pa dang dran zhing shes bzhin du lha bye ba khrig khrig brgya stong du mas bskor te/ mdun
93a6(mdo 'grel): du byas nas 'dir skye ba bstan to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs pa rnamasu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dag kyang yod do zhes bya ba ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin no// shA ri
93b1(mdo 'grel): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug po rnams thob pa gang dag 'dod pa'i khamasu yang mi skye/ gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i kham su yang mi skye'i/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa
93b2(mdo 'grel): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
93b3(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa gang dag mngon par shes pa drug po thob pa de dag gis rnams par rtse zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i sgra yang mi
93b4(mdo 'grel): grag pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa gang drag mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam
93b5(mdo 'grel): par brtse zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na tshe dpag tu med pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug
93b6(mdo 'grel): thob pa 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi kham su rgyu ba gang yin pa de dag der song nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra mi grag pa dang / chos kyi sgra mi grag pa dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra mi grag pa der 'dug
94a1(mdo 'grel): nas sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra rnams sgrogs par byed cing dkon mchog gsum po rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod de/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des de dag
94a2(mdo 'grel): sems dang bar 'gyur te/ de nas shi 'phos nas grang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa de dang der skye bar 'gyur bar byed pa dag kyang yod do zhes bya ba ni phyir mi 'ong ba yin no// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
94a3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi skyed nas/ yang de dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
94a4(mdo 'grel): las logs nas 'dod pa'i kham su skye bar byed de/ sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'am/ bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po
94a5(mdo 'grel): lta bu rnams skye ba yang yod do zhes bya ba ni mi'i rigs nas rig su skye ba'o// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug pa tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i
94a6(mdo 'grel): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug cing de dag kyang thabs mkhas pa'i stobs kyis bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye bar rgyal po chen po bzhi'i
94b1(mdo 'grel): ris kyi sgra rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye ste/ de dag der gnas shing sems can
94b2(mdo 'grel): rnams yongasu smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par byed/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyes par byed pa dag kyang yod do// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi
94b3(mdo 'grel): dradrung / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bskyed nas 'pho bar 'gyur ba de dag thabs mkhas pas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas 'og min gyi bar du skye'o// de dag de na yang tshangs pa'i tshangs pa chen
94b4(mdo 'grel): por 'gyur te/ tshangs pa'i gnas de dag tu gnas par 'gyur ro// de dag der gnas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
94b5(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i don du gsol ba 'debs par byed pa dag yod do zhes bya ba ni lha'i rigasu skye ba'o// // shA ri'i bu byang chub
94b6(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi thob pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du thob pa dang / de dag rje su rtogs par byed pa'i phyir spyod pa gang dag 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams
95a1(mdo 'grel): thob pa yin yang de dag mngon du mi byed pa dag yod de/ nA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni tshe gcig gis thogs par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bar chad gcig pa yin//
95a2(mdo 'grel): shA ri'i byA byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed bya nas nye bar bzung ste/ bsam gtan bzhi thob par gyur pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi thob par gyur pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
95a3(mdo 'grel): pa bzhi thob par gyur pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag por spyong pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam sgom par byed pa dang / stobs dang / mi 'jig gi/
95a4(mdo 'grel): pa dang / so so yang dag par rigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa thob pa dag thabs la mkhas pas tshangs ris kyi lha rnams nas 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du skye bar 'gyur zhing der bla na med pa yang dag par
95a5(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nas sems can gyi don byed pa dag yod do zhes bya ba ni bar ma dor yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'o// / shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag dang po sems bskyeng
95a6(mdo 'grel): pa nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can gzhal du med grangs med pa rnams kyi don byas nas phung po ma lus pa'i mya
95b1(mdo 'grel): ngan las 'das pa'i dbying su songs mya ngan las 'da' zhing / dri dag yongs sna nganA smras 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos bskal pa 'am/ bskul pa las lhag par gnas pa dag kyang yod do zhes bya ba ni skyes nas yongasu mya ngan las
95b2(mdo 'grel): 'da' ba'o// // wA r-in+ti buM byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen ze pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dong zhing de dag du yang sems can rnams byang chub
95b3(mdo 'grel): tu yang dag par 'jog pa byed do// de dag sems can rnams kyi don la rtag par brtson to nam yang don med po'i tshig mi smra'o// sems can gyi don du rtag tu brtson pa ma dus kyi zhing du 'gro'o// byang chub sems dpa'
95b4(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po de dag ni sems can rnams kyi don du bskal pa grangs med gzhal du med pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogasu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dag rgya
95b5(mdo 'grel): yod do zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcus pas yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'o// // shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon
95b6(mdo 'grel): med pa las yang dag par 'das shing phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la yang nges par gnas na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang skrun par byed pa dag yod do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems
96a1(mdo 'grel): dang ba bskyed pa nyid kyi shes rab su rlo tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams par 'jug cang de dag byung byasams dpa' bye khrag khrig pan stong du ma dang / 'dugs / nams pa pa dang / rang/
96a2(mdo 'grel): tsan yong su smin par bya ba dang / rang gi sangs rgyas kyi nang yongs dag par bya ba'i don du 'dong shing sa sa nas kyi 'o sku rgyog sa bla na mang ba yang dag byar rdzogs pa d+hA r+m+ma tu mngon du rdzogs pa sod da
96a3(mdo 'grel): bya ba ni mngon par 'du byed pa med par yongs rgyu na las 'da' rje no// shA r-i'irI bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po hU~M phyin pa drugs spyod pa gang dag 'a kho mams sgyum pa'i rgya por gyur nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pad+mo
96a4(mdo 'grel): byas te/ sems can thams cad la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad nye bar sgrub cing / zas 'dod pa rnams la zlas dang / skom 'dod pa rnams la skom dang / de bzhin du dr-i dang / phreng po dang / byug pa dang / bdug spos dang / mal stan dang / rkyenam
96a5(mdo 'grel): drung // khyim+b+ha dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mA tIkA dA / gaskyer dang / dngul da / b+h+ya ru rnams dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub par byed pa nas dge ba 'acu'i lus kyi lam rnams kyi sems can rnam pa rab tu dkod de/ tshangs ris nas
96a6(mdo 'grel): tshig min hUM lha rnams skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs rnam su blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'itsha rgya ba dag yod do zhes bya ba ni 'og mi khyi mthar thug par 'gro ba'o// / shA hU~M
96b1(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bsam gtan bzhi bsgrubs te/ bsam gtan rnams las yong su nyams nas bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnamasu skye zhing de dag yang bsam gtan rnams bsgrubs nas
96b2(mdo 'grel): 'og min gyi bar du skyes nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs rnamasu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bo dag yod do zhes bya ba ni 'phar ba'o// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
96b3(mdo 'grel): chen po gang dag tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos nas gnas gtsang mar skyes te/ gnas gtsang ma'i gnas gcig gam gnyis las rgal te 'og min du skyes nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogasu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
96b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i byang chug tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yod do zhes bya ba ni phyed du 'phar ba'o// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bdag nyid kyi lus de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bur sprul nas dga' ldan gyi gnas/
96b5(mdo 'grel): sbyangs shing tshangs ris kyi lha'i gnas nas 'og min gyi lha'i bar du skyes te/ thabs la mkhas pas sems can dmyal ba rnams la chos ston cing / dung 'gro'i skyes gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams la yang chos ston pa
96b6(mdo 'grel): ngag yod do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing bdag nyid kyis lus sangs rgyas kyi sku ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i lus su mngon par sprul nas/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i
97a1(mdo 'grel): klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam
97a2(mdo 'grel): par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongasu bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongasu bsgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems
97a3(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thog pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dang / de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing
97a4(mdo 'grel): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur bar byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par
97a5(mdo 'grel): phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongasu bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba dang khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongasu bsgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu
97a6(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye ba byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshog su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang yod do zhes bya ba
97b1(mdo 'grel): niganas thams cad du 'chi 'pho ba'o// / shU ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa sgrub par byed pa dag tshangs ris nas dge rgyas kyi bar gyi lha rnams skye zhing / de na
97b2(mdo 'grel): namakha' mtha' yas skye mched nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du skye bar byed de/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogasu skye bar 'gyu ro zhes bya ba ni srid pa'i rtse mo'i mthar thug par 'gro ba'o// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
97b3(mdo 'grel): chen po bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa thob par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du skye bar 'gyur zhing / de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogasu skye
97b4(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur ba dag yod do zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba'o// // shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu
97b5(mdo 'grel): rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan cing dbang po yong su dag pa bla na med pa rnams dang ldan te/ nam yang ngan song ngan 'gre log par ltung ba rnamasu skye bar mi 'gyur ba nyid dang / bdag nyid la bstod par mi byed/ gzhan la smod par mi byed de/
97b6(mdo 'grel): de dag dbang po yongs su dag pa de rnams dang ldan pas skye bo mang po byams shing yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang sems rab tu dang ba de nyid kyi theg pa gsum
98a1(mdo 'grel): gyis rim gyis yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lus yongasu dag pa la bsgrub par bya'o// ngag yongasu dag pa dang / yid yongasu
98a2(mdo 'grel): dag pa la bslab par bya'o// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa gang dag dbang po shin tu gsal ba thob nas/ de dag dbang po shin tu gsal ba de dag gis bdag la mi bstod cing
98a3(mdo 'grel): gzhan la mi smod pa dag kyang yod do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag dang po sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing
98a4(mdo 'grel): phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ma thob kyi bar du nam yang ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba rnam su mi skye ba dag yod do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag dang po sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung nas/
98a5(mdo 'grel): phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ma thob kyi bar du nam yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mi gtong ba dag yod do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
98a6(mdo 'grel): phyin pa la gnas shing 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas/ sems can rnams la sbyin pa byin te/ de dag nyid dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la rab tu dgod pa dag yod do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
98b1(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid brgya phrag du ma yongasu bzung / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid brgya stong phrag du ma yongasu bzung ste/
98b2(mdo 'grel): de la gnas nas sangs rgyas bye ba khyag khrig brgya stong du ma mnyes par byed de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad la bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod par byed cing / de'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang
98b3(mdo 'grel): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dag yod do zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'da' ba'o// // shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
98b4(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang dag bsam gtan bzhi thob pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob pa de dag bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de
98b5(mdo 'grel): dag gis rnams par rtse zhing bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go// de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go// de las langs nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go//
98b6(mdo 'grel): de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go// de las langs nas bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go// de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug
99a1(mdo 'grel): de las langs nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go// de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go// de las langs nas na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par
99a2(mdo 'grel): 'jug go/ de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go// de las langs nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go// de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par
99a3(mdo 'grel): 'jug go// de las langs nas cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go// de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go// de las langs nas 'du shes meng 'du shes med min skye mched la
99a4(mdo 'grel): snyoms par 'jug go// de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dag yod // shA ri'i bu da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs
99a5(mdo 'grel): mkhas pa dang ldan pa rnams bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / ti nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag yang dang yang du rnam par mnan cing snyoms par 'jug pas thod rgal la yang snyoms par zhugs naso// sangs rgyas kyi
99a6(mdo 'grel): zhing sna tshog su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bya ba ni lus kyi mngon sum du byed pa'o// // shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pa
99b1(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas nas sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snang ba byed cing bdag nyid kyang nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba de dang bral bar ma/
99b2(mdo 'grel): byed pa dag kyang yod do zhes bya ba ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa'o// // shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sangs rgyas mi bzhugs shing nyan thos rnams kyang med pa'i 'jig rten gyi
99b3(mdo 'grel): khamasu rang byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dag yod do// de dag thabs la mkhas pas srog chags brgya stong bye ba phrag mang po theg pa gsum gyis yongasu smin par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
99b4(mdo 'grel): par 'tshang rgya ba yin no zhes bya ba ni rang sangs rgyaso// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang /
99b5(mdo 'grel): byang chub kyi yan lag thob pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams thob pa dag rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed/ lan cig
99b6(mdo 'grel): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub thob par mi byed kyi/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing thabs mkhas pas sems can thams cad lam la btsud
100a1(mdo 'grel): cing rnam par sbyangs nas/ sems can de dag des rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub thob par
100a2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur bar byed pa dag yod de/ bdag nyid kyis mngon sum du ma byas par gzhan de la rab tu dbod par byed do zhes bya ba ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gyis thob par bya ba'i 'bras bu rnams yin no// // shA ri'i bu nyan thos
100a3(mdo 'grel): dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i ye shes dang / spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod pa yin te zhes bya ba ni rang gis ma thob pa'i chos
100a4(mdo 'grel): la gzhan 'god pa yin no// // shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de lta bus de ltar rnam par spyod pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa yin par shes par bya'o// shA ri'i
100a5(mdo 'grel): bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing dga' ldan gyi gnas yongasu sbyor ba dag kyang yod do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bskal pa
100a6(mdo 'grel): bzang po par shes par bya'o// shA ri'i bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi mngon par rtogs pa 'di gang la yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa yin par shes par bya'o// shA ri'i bu de lta bas na
100b1(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyis las rnams kyi go mi dbye'o zhes bya ba/ 'di dag gis ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems
100b2(mdo 'grel): dpa'i dge 'dun gsal bar bstan to// dge 'dun dkon mchog la gdams pa'o// // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
100b3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / yid kyis las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
100b4(mdo 'grel): shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du gang gis lus kyi las yang dag par rtsom pa'i lus de ni gang yin/ gang gis ngag gi las yang dag par rtsom pa'i
100b5(mdo 'grel): ngagA de ni gang yin gang gis yid kyis las yang dag par rtsom pa'i yid de ni gang yin snyam pa 'di ni/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rtson pa kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'o//
100b6(mdo 'grel): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ni lus gang dang / ngag gang dang / yid gang gis ser sna dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / gnod sems dang / le lo dang / rnam par
101a1(mdo 'grel): g.yeng ba dang / shes rab 'chal pa'i sems bskyed par byed pa'i lus mi dmig so// ngag mi dmig so// yid myi dmigasaso// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
101a2(mdo 'grel): lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len bskyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni gnas meng cing go skabs med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus kyi gnas
101a3(mdo 'grel): ngan len sbyong bar byed/ ngag gi gnas ngan lan sbyong bar byed/ yid kyi gnas ngan len sbyong bar byed do// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus kyi gnas ngan len sbyong ba dang /
101a4(mdo 'grel): ngag gi gnas ngan len sbyong ba dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len sbyong ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus mi dmigs pa dang / ngab mi dmigs pa dang / sems
101a5(mdo 'grel): mi dmigs pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas dran len yongasu sbyong ba yin no// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang gral te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye
101a6(mdo 'grel): par gzung ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yang dag par blangs te gnas shing / nyan thos kyi sems sa mo/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems bskyed pa med par de rtag tu rgyun mi 'chang bar sems can thams cad la snying rje chenacho
101b1(mdo 'grel): sosems nyo bar 'jog pa de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len yong su dag pa zhes ngas bshad // shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
101b2(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang dag byang chub kyi lam yongasu sbyong zhing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byeng / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
101b3(mdo 'grel): phyin pa la spyod par byed/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed pa dag yod do// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub
101b4(mdo 'grel): kyi lam gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam lus mi dmigs pa dang / ngag mi dmigs pa dang / yid mi dmigs pa
101b5(mdo 'grel): dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang / bsam gtan
101b6(mdo 'grel): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang / nyan thos mi dmigs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas mi dmigs pa
102a1(mdo 'grel): 'di ni/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam yin te/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'o// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam 'dis 'gro
102a2(mdo 'grel): zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams la spyod pa ni thub par mi nus pa yin no zhes bya ba ni ma zhen pa la gdams pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul ji lta bur spyod pa rnams gzhan
102a3(mdo 'grel): thams cad kyis thub pa ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugasu mi rlom pa dang / tshor
102a4(mdo 'grel): bAr mi rlom pa dang / 'du shesu mi rlom pa dang / 'du byed rnamasu mi rlom pa dang / rnam par shes par mi rlom pa dang / sa'i khamasu mi rlom pa dang / chu'i kham su mi rlom pa dang / me'i kham su mi rlom pa dang / rlung gi kham su
102a5(mdo 'grel): mi rlom pa dang / nam mkha'i khamasu mi rlom pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i kham su mi rlom pa dang / mig gi kham su mi rlom pa dang / gzugs kyi khamasu mi rlom pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rlom pa dang / rna ba'i
102a6(mdo 'grel): kham su mi rlom pa dang / sgra'i kham su mi rlom pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i kham su mi rlom pa dang / sna'i kham su mi rlom pa dang / dri'i kham su mi rlom pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i kham su mi rlom pa dang / lce'i kham su mi
102b1(mdo 'grel): rlom pa dang / ro'i kham su mi rlom pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i kham su mi rlom pa dang / lus kyi kham su mi rlom pa dang / reg bya'i khamasu mi rlom pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khamasu mi rlom pa dang / yid kyi khams myi rlom pa
102b2(mdo 'grel): dang / chos kyi khamasu mi rlom pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khas su mi rlom pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag par mi rlom pa dang / yang dag par sbyong bar mi rlom pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par mi rlom pa dang / dbang por mi rlom pa
102b3(mdo 'grel): dang / stobasu mi rlom pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag tu mi rlom pa dang / lam du mo rlom pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par mi rlom pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi rlom pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par mi rlom
102b4(mdo 'grel): pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi rlom pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par mi rlom pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi rlom pa dang / mi 'jigs par mi rlom pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur
102b5(mdo 'grel): mi rlom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du mi rlom pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bur mi rlom pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur mi rlom pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur mi rlom pa dang / dgra
102b6(mdo 'grel): bcom pa nyid du mi rlom pa dang / rang byang chub tu mi rlom pa dang / lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid du mi rlom pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rlom pa med pa de lta na shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
103a1(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis rnam par 'phel te/ sus kyang thub pa med pa yin no// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
103a2(mdo 'grel): kyi ye shes yongasu rdzogs par byed pa dang / ye shes de dang ldan pas ngan song thams cad kyi sgo bcad par 'gyur pa dang / mi dbul zhing 'phongs pa yang nyams myong bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lus gang dang ldan pas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig
103a3(mdo 'grel): rten gyi nang na smad por 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus yongasu 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do zhes bya ba ni yongasu mi ngal ba la gdams pa'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'dra
103a4(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po ye shes gang dang ldan pas shar phyogs kyi 'jig
103a5(mdo 'grel): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // de dag gi chos bstan pa yang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /
103a6(mdo 'grel): sa rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams
103b1(mdo 'grel): gung+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gAng+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // de dag gi chos bstan pa yang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun la yang bsnyen paSh+Ta
103b2(mdo 'grel): byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do// byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes mo skyed do//
103b3(mdo 'grel): nyon thos kyi 'du shes mi spyad do// rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do// bdag gi 'du shes myi skyed do// gzhan gyi 'du shes mi skyed do// sangs rgyus kyi zhing gi 'du shes mi skyed do// ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems
103b4(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/
103b5(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do// pha rol tu phyin pa rnam su dmigs pa yang med do// ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dran
103b6(mdo 'grel): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom par byed do// dran pa nyi bar 'jog pa rnamasu dmigs pa yong med do// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams sgom
104a1(mdo 'grel): par byed de/ yang dag par spong bdang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lamya du dmigs pa yang med do// stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma/
104a2(mdo 'grel): 'dres pa rnams sgrub par byed la/ stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmigs pa yang med do// shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes te/ ye shes de dang
104a3(mdo 'grel): ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yong su rdzogs par byed la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad du yang rlom pa med pa yin no zhes bya ba ni lam yongasu 'dzin pa la gdams
104a4(mdo 'grel): pa'o// // shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag mig lnga rab tu thob pa dang yong su sbyong ba yod do// mig gang lnga rab tu thob pa dang yongasu sbyong zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sha'i mig dang / lha'i mig dang /
104a5(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi mig dang / chos kyi mig dang / sangs rgyas kyi mig go// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongasu dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
104a6(mdo 'grel): stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gang gis dpag tshad brgya mthong ba yod do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gang gis dpag tshad nyis brgya dang / sum
104b1(mdo 'grel): brgya dang / bzhi brgya dang / lnga brgya dang / stong gi bar du mthong ba yod do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling mthong ba yod do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
104b2(mdo 'grel): chen po'i shA'i mig gang gis gling gnyis dang / gling gsum dang / gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do// sha'i mig gang gis stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do// sha'i mig gang gis stong gnyis
104b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do// shA ri'i bu 'dri ni byang chub sems
104b4(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yong su dag pa'o// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yong su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
104b5(mdo 'grel): shA ri'i bu rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// sum+b+ha cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//
104b6(mdo 'grel): 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig
105a1(mdo 'grel): gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshungs ris kyi sgra rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de na
105a2(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshangs pa mdun na 'don gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshangs 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas
105a3(mdo 'grel): rab tu shes so// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// 'od chung gi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshad med 'od kyi lha rnams
105a4(mdo 'grel): kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// 'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// dge chung gi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub
105a5(mdo 'grel): sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// smon
105a6(mdo 'grel): med kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// bsod nams skyes kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha
105b1(mdo 'grel): mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// 'du shes med pa'i sems can gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chubya sems dpas rab tu shes pa// mi slong ba'i sgra rnams kyi sna'i mig gang yin pa de ni byung
105b2(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// legs mthong gi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//
105b3(mdo 'grel): rab lha'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
105b4(mdo 'grel): chen po'i lha'i mig de ni rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams
105b5(mdo 'grel): kyis mi shes so// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// tshangs ris pa'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// tshangs pa mdun nu 'don gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// tshangs 'khor ba'i lha rnams kyis mi sheso// tshangs
105b6(mdo 'grel): chen gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// 'od chung gi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// tshad med 'od kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// 'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// dge chung gi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// tshad med dge'i
106a1(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis mi shes so// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// sprin med kyis lha rnams kyis mi shes so// bsod nams skyes kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// 'du
106a2(mdo 'grel): shes med pa'i sems can gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// mi spong ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// legs mthong gi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// rab lha'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// 'og
106a3(mdo 'grel): min gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// lha'i mig yong su dag pa de dag nyid kyis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi byed ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//
106a4(mdo 'grel): yongasu dag pa'i lha'i mig de nyid kyis lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yongasu dag pa'i lha'i mig de nyid kyis
106a5(mdo 'grel): nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yongasu drag pa'i lha'i mig de nyid kyis byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
106a6(mdo 'grel): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams
106b1(mdo 'grel): cad kyi 'chi 'phyo ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta bu bzhin du rab tu shes so// shar m+bu'i phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i drung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'tsha 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
106b2(mdo 'grel): shes so// lho nub kyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nub byang gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khyams gang+gA'i
106b3(mdo 'grel): klung gi bye ma skud kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'phro ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho bya dang
106b4(mdo 'grel): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang drug pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub
106b5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yong su dag pa'o// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yong su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
106b6(mdo 'grel): stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi mig gang dang ldan pas 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas sam/ dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba 'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa 'am/ kha na ma tho ba med pa 'am/ zag
107a1(mdo 'grel): pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag pa med pa 'am/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa 'am/ nyon mongs pa med pa 'am/ 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa 23/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba yang rung ste/
107a2(mdo 'grel): chos gang yang rab tu mi shes pa med pa dang shes rab kyi mig gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang yang ma mthong ma thos/ ma bsams khang du ma chud pa med pa ni/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
107a3(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongasasu dag pa'o// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcol ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i
107a4(mdo 'grel): bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig gi gang zag 'dri ni dang pA'i rje su 'brang ba'o// gang zag 'di ni chos kyi rje su 'brang ba'o// gang zag 'di ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa ste/ gang zag 'dri'i dab bo
107a5(mdo 'grel): lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyis skye bar 'gyur ro// dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting 'dzin la rig par 'gyuraro// de ma thag pa'i tingange 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye'o// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong
107a6(mdo 'grel): bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / the tshom dang // tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs snyems pa'i kun du sbyar ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/ gang zag 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa zhes bya'o// des sgom pa'i lam rab tu thob nas/ 'dod pa/
107b1(mdo 'grel): 'dod chags dang / gnod sems rab tu bsrabs pa'i phyir na gang zag 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes bya'o// de sgom pa'i lam cher bsgoms pa de nyid kyi 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems rab tu spangs pa'i phyir na gang zag 'di ni
107b2(mdo 'grel): phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya'o// de sgom pa'i lam cher bsgom pa de nyid kyis gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang / ma rig pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgod pa rab tu spangs pas gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa zhes bya'o// /
107b3(mdo 'grel): gang zag 'di ni mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa ste/ gang zag 'di ni dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pas skye bar 'gyuraro// dbang po lngas de ma thug pa'i tingange 'dzin la reg par 'gyuraro// de ma thag pa'i ting 'dzin gyis rnam par
107b4(mdo 'grel): grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur pa nas gang zag 'di ni smin pa med pa la gnas pa ste/ 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pas skye bar 'gyur ro// dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting 'dzin thob par 'gyuraro// de ma
107b5(mdo 'grel): thag pa'i ting 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyuraro// shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yong su dag pa'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
107b6(mdo 'grel): pos ni 'di ltar rab tu shes te/ gang cung zad kun 'byung ba'i chos de thams cad ni 'gog pa'i chos can no zhes rab tu shes shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na dbang po lnga 'thob ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
108a1(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yong su dag pa'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar rab tu shes te/ gang zhig sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
108a2(mdo 'grel): la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa yin te/ de ni de'i lam dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po thob ste/ thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa de ni bsams bzhin du bdag gi lus yongasasu 'dzin to// byang
108a3(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba brtan pa yin te/ rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnamasu skye bar 'gyur/ 'di ni bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnam su skye bar 'gyur/ 'di ni khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnamasu
108a4(mdo 'grel): skye bar 'gyur/ 'di ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnam su skye bar 'gyur/ 'di ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnamasu skye bar 'gyur/ 'di ni 'thab bral gyi lha rnamasu skye bar 'gyur/ 'di ni dga' ldan gyi lha rnamasu skye bar 'gyur/ 'doni 'phrul
108a5(mdo 'grel): dga'i lha rnamasu skye bar 'gyur/ 'di ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnamasu skye bar 'gyur/ 'di ni 'og min gyi bar du skye bar 'gyur te/ de der gnas nas sems can rnams yong su smin par 'gyur te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad
108a6(mdo 'grel): kyis de dag la rim gror byed par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur/ bkur stir byed par 'gyur/ bla
108b1(mdo 'grel): mar byed par 'gyur ra mor byed par 'gyur/ mtshad par byed par 'gyur// nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sngar yang mi ltung ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po 'dri ni bla na med bya yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung
108b2(mdo 'grel): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du phyir ldeg par mi 'gyuraro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongasasu dag pa'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byung
