232b1(mdo 'grel): tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
232b2(mdo 'grel): ba'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa/
232b3(mdo 'grel): rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// dran pa nye bar
232b4(mdo 'grel): gzhag pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o// yang dag par sbyong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang /
232b5(mdo 'grel): stobs rnams kyang de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
232b6(mdo 'grel): 'dres pa'o// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni skrag par mi 'gyur/
233a1(mdo 'grel): kun tu skrag par mi 'gyur/ kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni yongasu 'dzin pa dang po thabs la mkhas pas yongasu zin pa yin no// // rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das
233a2(mdo 'grel): gang dag gis yongasu bzung bste shes rab kyi pha rol tu byon pa 'di bsten pa thos nas mi dngang / kun tu mi skyug kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bu skyes gnyen
233a3(mdo 'grel): gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de lce gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
233a4(mdo 'grel): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mA gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / tshor bya dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byung rnams dang / rnam par
233a5(mdo 'grel): shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de drug thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi ser yongasu bsnor ma
233a6(mdo 'grel): 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs
233b1(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar de mi
233b2(mdo 'grel): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / gang de la tshor ba dang / 'du
233b3(mdo 'grel): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang /
233b4(mdo 'grel): mtshan ma myed ce s+t+waM bya ba dang / smon pa med ces b+hA bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sngar
233b5(mdo 'grel): yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen
233b6(mdo 'grel): ni gang de la mig mi rtag ces bya bar ngo mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /
234a1(mdo 'grel): smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar bsngor mi 'jug pa
234a2(mdo 'grel): dang / gang de la rna ba dang / sgra dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid myi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zho zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /
234a3(mdo 'grel): smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sngar yongs bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/
234a4(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gung de gzugs mi rtag ces bya
234a5(mdo 'grel): bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmig
234a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasasu bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang // reg dang /
234b1(mdo 'grel): chos mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / sman pa med ces bya/
234b2(mdo 'grel): du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub
234b3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge bu'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen no gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa
234b4(mdo 'grel): dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang /
234b5(mdo 'grel): mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
234b6(mdo 'grel): sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / rna ba'i rnam por shes pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
235a1(mdo 'grel): tshor ba dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
235a2(mdo 'grel): tshor ba dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te rig pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces
235a3(mdo 'grel): bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya bya dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtse ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
235a4(mdo 'grel): ci mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sngar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor
235a5(mdo 'grel): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba
235a6(mdo 'grel): dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
235b1(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i
235b2(mdo 'grel): lam yan lag brgyad pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan mya med ces
235b3(mdo 'grel): bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sngar yongasu bsnor mi
235b4(mdo 'grel): 'jug pa da / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mi rtag ces b+ha bar de mI dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
235b5(mdo 'grel): dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces
235b6(mdo 'grel): bya ba dang / zho zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
236a1(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya
236a2(mdo 'grel): stedage ba'i bshes gnyen nges yong su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa thos na/ mi ngadang / kun tu mi skrag/ kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro// rab
236a3(mdo 'grel): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas dngade zhing kun tu sgrog la kun tu
236a4(mdo 'grel): skrag pa dang ldan par 'gyur pa thabs mi mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song bar 'gyur pa ji lta bu zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
236a5(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des
236a6(mdo 'grel): kyang rlom semasasu byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral bas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom semasasu byed pa dang / rnam pa
236b1(mdo 'grel): thams cad mkhyen pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral bas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yid la byed pa
236b2(mdo 'grel): dang bral bas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom semasasu byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing
236b3(mdo 'grel): dmigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang
236b4(mdo 'grel): rlom semasasu byed pa de lta bu ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mi mkhas par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
236b5(mdo 'grel): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral bas gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs
236b6(mdo 'grel): phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa dang bral bas tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
237a1(mdo 'grel): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed pa dang / rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa dang bral bas rnam pa
237a2(mdo 'grel): shes pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// mig nang stong pa zhes bya
237a3(mdo 'grel): bar yid la byed/ mig phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing stong pa nyid de yang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
237a4(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid dngos po
237a5(mdo 'grel): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ ci nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom semasu byed pa dang / gzugs nang stong po zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs
237a6(mdo 'grel): phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ sgra dang / dri dang / re dang / rig dang / chos nang stong pa zhes bya bar
237b1(mdo 'grel): yid la byed/ chos phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/
237b2(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar
237b3(mdo 'grel): yid la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yod la byed/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa
237b4(mdo 'grel): dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos
237b5(mdo 'grel): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sem su byed pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid
237b6(mdo 'grel): la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la
238a1(mdo 'grel): byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes
238a2(mdo 'grel): bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa phyinang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i
238a3(mdo 'grel): tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid des kyang rlom semasasu byed pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar dang / de bzhin du mig gi 'dus te rig pa nas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar dang / mig gi 'dus te reg bI
238a4(mdo 'grel): rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig kI 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang spyong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gri
238a5(mdo 'grel): dus+yA te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid lce byed/ rna bya'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor po dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
238a6(mdo 'grel): gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi
238b1(mdo 'grel): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs te/ dmigs
238b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / sa'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ sa'i
238b3(mdo 'grel): khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ces bya bar yid la byed/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid
238b4(mdo 'grel): la byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes
238b5(mdo 'grel): bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
238b6(mdo 'grel): kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor po dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar
239a1(mdo 'grel): yid la byed/ rga shi phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rga shi phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rga shi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing nang stong pa nyid de yang dmi
239a2(mdo 'grel): tedamigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid nges kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yid
239a3(mdo 'grel): la byed pa dang bral bas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom zhing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhug pa de dag gis kyang rlol semasu byed do// de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba
239a4(mdo 'grel): dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
239a5(mdo 'grel): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams sgom par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgya
239a6(mdo 'grel): kyi chos de dag gis kyang rlom sem su byed do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar thabs mi mkhas pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos
239b1(mdo 'grel): nas/ dngang zhing kun tu skrag la/ skrag pas zin par 'gyuro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pa gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa thos nas/ ngangang zhing kun tu skrag la skrag pas zin par
239b2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa'i grogs pos zin par ji ltar 'gyur pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs
239b3(mdo 'grel): po ni gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar byed pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin
239b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba byed pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin/ 'di ni chos ma yin/ 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin gyis/ 'di la bslabs par bya ba'i mi cha'o// mdo sde 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa ste//
239b5(mdo 'grel): 'di dag ni mnyan par mi bya'o// gzung bar mi bya'o// bcang bar mi bya'o// klag par mi bya'o// kun chub par mi bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya'o// 'di dag ni gzhan la bstan par mi bya'o zhes zer ba 'di ni rab 'byor byang chub
239b6(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o sdig pa'i grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud sdig to can sangs rgyas kyi cha byang du byas pa
240a1(mdo 'grel): dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug las zlog cing mos pa med par byed de/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/
240a2(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
240a3(mdo 'grel): pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba 'ong ngo zhes bdud kyi las mo ston/ bdud kyi nyes pa mi ston pa 'di ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
240a4(mdo 'grel): sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo dang / dbyangs kyi bsnyad
240a5(mdo 'grel): pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshog su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la phag
240a6(mdo 'grel): par bstan pa dag ston te/ 'grel lo// rnam par 'byed do// gsal bar byed do// yongasu ston to zhes bdud kyi las rnam pa 'di lta bu dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs
240b1(mdo 'grel): por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod la ni byang chub kyi sems cung zad kyang med/
240b2(mdo 'grel): khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa yang ma yin/ khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus so zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las ngag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ rab
240b3(mdo 'grel): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rog par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byang du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i drung
240b4(mdo 'grel): du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu mig ni byadag gam+b+ha bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni bdag gram bdag gis stong ngo // gzugs ni bdag gaum bdag gis stong ngo // sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang /
240b5(mdo 'grel): reg dang / chos ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mig gi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /
240b6(mdo 'grel): yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /
241a1(mdo 'grel): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi
241a2(mdo 'grel): tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar ni bdag gam
241a3(mdo 'grel): bdag gis stong ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis
241a4(mdo 'grel): stong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lom rnams nas sangs rgyas kyi chos
241a5(mdo 'grel): ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar ni bdag gam bdag gis stong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te yang ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las ngag mo smra mi ston pa 'di
241a6(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpar sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byoraro gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag rang sangs rgyas kyi cha byang du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
241b1(mdo 'grel): drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yang med do// byang chub sems dpa' zhes
241b2(mdo 'grel): bya ba yang med do// nyan thos zhes bya ba yang med do// lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems
241b3(mdo 'grel): dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di lnga ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yang med do// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang med do// nyan thos zhes bya ba yang med do// zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi spro mi ston pa 'di ni//
241b4(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can ngag nyan thos kyi cha byad du byas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ rnam pa
241b5(mdo 'grel): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las zlog cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gdams pa dang / rjesu bstan pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las ngag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems
241b6(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag mkhan po dang srog dpon gyi cha byang du byas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ byang
242a1(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las zlog cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las zlog ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi
242a2(mdo 'grel): rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i bar gyi chos
242a3(mdo 'grel): rnams la sbyor zhing / de ltar rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos de dag yongasasu sgoms la nyan thos kyi sa mngon du gyis shig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag
242a4(mdo 'grel): mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag pha dang ma'i cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung
242a5(mdo 'grel): du phyin te/ 'di skad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ de'i don du ni bskal pa tshad meng grangs med par 'khor b+ha na 'byor zhing / rkang lag dang mgo
242a6(mdo 'grel): bcod pa tshad med pas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis/ gang la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya bar yod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya bar yod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya
242b1(mdo 'grel): bar yod pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya bar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig ces zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las ngag mi sgyu mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig
242b2(mdo 'grel): par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzugs
242b3(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
242b4(mdo 'grel): shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs
242b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mig mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /
242b6(mdo 'grel): rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
243a1(mdo 'grel): ston pa dang / gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul
243a2(mdo 'grel): gyis ston pa dang / sgra dang / dI dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmig
243a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i
243a4(mdo 'grel): tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa
243a5(mdo 'grel): dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang /
243a6(mdo 'grel): dben pa dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
243b1(mdo 'grel): drang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /
243b2(mdo 'grel): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag myed pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul
243b3(mdo 'grel): gyis ston pa dang / rna bya'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus
243b4(mdo 'grel): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal pa dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / dran pa
243b5(mdo 'grel): nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / mtshan mi med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
243b6(mdo 'grel): ston pa dang / de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sangs
244a1(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi byar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa/
244a2(mdo 'grel): tshul gyis ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las ngag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs
244a3(mdo 'grel): por rig par bya ste/ de ltar shes nas kyang yongasu spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni yongasu 'dzin pa gnyis pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu zin pa yin no// 'o dag gis ni nges par 'byed pa'i yan lag bzhi bstan to// /
244a4(mdo 'grel): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i tshig 'di'i don gang lags// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
244a5(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don ni tshig gi don med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub la ni skye ba 'am/ yod pa nyid dam med pa nyid yod pa 'am
244a6(mdo 'grel): dmigs pa ma yin te/ rab 'byor da byor byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don mod pan zhes bya ba ni rigs kyi rang gi rnga ma yin no// / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dpe yin/ namakha' la bya'i rjes med cing mi dmig so// rab byor
244b1(mdo 'grel): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rmi lam la gnas med cing mi dmigaso// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigasaso//
244b2(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma lnga gnas med cing mi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmyig so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ smig rgyu la gnas med cing mi dmigs
244b3(mdo 'grel): so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigaso// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / de bzhin gshegs
244b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i sprul pa la gnas med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi rlon med cing mi dmig sngo zhes bya ba ni drong du gtogs pa'i rten can yin no// // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/
244b5(mdo 'grel): yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas myed cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med tsang mi dmigaso// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin nyid lnga gnas med cing mi dmig so// de
244b6(mdo 'grel): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gis don med cing mi dmigaso// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi
245a1(mdo 'grel): gnas nyid dang / chos nges pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid la gnas med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmyigasaso zhes bya ba ni rtse mor gtogs pa'i rten/
245a2(mdo 'grel): can yin no// // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs la gnas med cing mi dmigaso// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
245a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dra migs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas med cing myi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
245a4(mdo 'grel): chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig la tshig gi don med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu
245a5(mdo 'grel): ma'i skyes bu'i rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la tshig gi don med cang mi dmyig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med
245a6(mdo 'grel): cing mi dmigaso// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigaso// sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigo so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
245b1(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing yi dmig so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i migu dang / gzugs dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa la
245b2(mdo 'grel): tshig gi don med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpe'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/
245b3(mdo 'grel): sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rna ba dang / sgra dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la tshig gi don med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
245b4(mdo 'grel): tshig gi don med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i sgra dang d+hi dang sna'i rnam par shes pa la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub semaso dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
245b5(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed cing mi dmigs// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i lce dang / ro dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa la tshig gi don med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor de
245b6(mdo 'grel): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i lus dang reg bya dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa
246a1(mdo 'grel): la tshig gi don med cing mi dmyig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor
246a2(mdo 'grel): 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i ying dang / chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la tshig gi don med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang
246a3(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigaso zhes bya ba ni bzod par gtogs pa'i rten bstan pa yin no// // bam po bcu gsum po// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i byang chub
246a4(mdo 'grel): sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshi ga gI don med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
246a5(mdo 'grel): 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta sgro dper na/ skyo mya'i skyes bu'i dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i byang chub
246a6(mdo 'grel): sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
246b1(mdo 'grel): 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /
246b2(mdo 'grel): 'a'aphags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / phung po rnams dang / kha las rna las dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten
246b3(mdo 'grel): cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa'i byang chubo sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing li dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
246b4(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba'i byang chub sems da pa'i tshig gi don med cing mI mIg s+t+wa~M so zhes rgyu ba ni chos kyi mchog tu gtogs pa'i rten bstan pa yin no// / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dperan/ de
246b5(mdo 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la tshig gi don med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
246b6(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
247a1(mdo 'grel): shes pa la tshig gi don med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi dor med cing ma dmag so//
247a2(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigaso// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
247a3(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigasaso// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang /
247a4(mdo 'grel): yod la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigaso// rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
247a5(mdo 'grel): dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong po nyid kyi bar lnga spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigaso// rab
247a6(mdo 'grel): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigaso// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
247b1(mdo 'grel): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stebs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
247b2(mdo 'grel): pa bco brgyad la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi/
247b3(mdo 'grel): don med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'di lta sde dper na/ 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings la 'dus byas kyi khams kyi gnas med cing mi dmig so// 'dus byas kyi khams la 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings kyi gnas med cing mi dmig so// rab
247b4(mdo 'grel): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing ma dri mig so zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam gyi rten bstan pa yin no// // rab 'byor
247b5(mdo 'grel): 'di lta ste dper na/ skye ba med pa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi
247b6(mdo 'grel): dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mi dmigs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de
248a1(mdo 'grel): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rnam par byang ba med pa'o//
248a2(mdo 'grel): tshig gi don med cing mi dmigaso// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/
248a3(mdo 'grel): gzugs kyi skye ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmig so// gzugs kyi 'gag pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa dang / 'byung ba dang / dmigs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba la tshig gi don med cing mi
248a4(mdo 'grel): dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa dang / 'byung ba dang / dmigs pa dang / kun
248a5(mdo 'grel): nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byed pa la tshig gi don med cing mi dmig so// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i skye ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing
248a6(mdo 'grel): 'brel par 'byung ba'i rnam par byang ba'i bar la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigaso// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /
248b1(mdo 'grel): mngon par shes pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi skye ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmig so// de bzhin du sangs
248b2(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rnam par byang ba'i bar la tshig gi don med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med
248b3(mdo 'grel): cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na shin tu dben pa'i phyir gzugs la mtshan ma'i gnas med cing mi dmigaso// shin tu dben pa'i phyir tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mtshan ma'i
248b4(mdo 'grel): gnas med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigaso// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/
248b5(mdo 'grel): shin tu dben pa'i phyir/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten+da tsAng 'brel par 'byung ba so so byA dang / bsdus pa rnams la mtshan ma'i gonas med cing mi dmigasaso// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
248b6(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la gnas med cing mi dmig so// de bzhin du byang
249a1(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigaso// de bzhin du yang dag par spod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po
249a2(mdo 'grel): dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa dang / 'phags pa'i badren pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / mngon par
249a3(mdo 'grel): shes pa rnams dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag pa la gnas med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor
249a4(mdo 'grel): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bdag med pa'i phyir bdag rnam par dag pa lo/
249a5(mdo 'grel): gnas med cing mi dmig so// sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shad lhas skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i phyir/ sems rgyun dang /
249a6(mdo 'grel): srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shing pu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor po po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa la gnas med cing mi dmig so// rab
249b1(mdo 'grel): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigaso zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi rten yin no// // rab 'byor 'di lta
249b2(mdo 'grel): ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mngon par 'char ba'i 'od la mun pa'i gnas med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
249b3(mdo 'grel): tshig gi don med cing mi dmig so zhes bya ba ni gnyen po'i phyogs kyi rten yin no// / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bskal pa'i me 'brar ba'i tshe/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi gnas med cing mi dmigo so// rab 'byor de
249b4(mdo 'grel): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigaso zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs spong ba'i rten yin no// // rab 'byor 'di lta
249b5(mdo 'grel): ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la tshul khrims ngan pa'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
249b6(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzin la rnam par g.ye
250a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i gnas med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmig so// rab
250a2(mdo 'grel): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shes rab la shes rab 'chal pa'i gnas med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
250a3(mdo 'grel): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par
250a4(mdo 'grel): grol bya la rnam par ma grol ba'i gnas ming cing mi dmigasaso// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmig so//
250a5(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa la rnam par grolA~M ba'i ye shes ma gzigs pa'i gnas myed cing mi dmig so//
250a6(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni gnyen po dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rnam par
250b1(mdo 'grel): rtog pa spong ba'i rten yin no// / rab 'byor 'angadi lta ste dper na/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od la gnas med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod b+ha/
250b2(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs zhes bya ba ni shes rab dang snying rje'i rten yin no// / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / gza' dang / skar ma dang / nor bu rin po che dang /
250b3(mdo 'grel): glog gi 'od la gnas med cing mi dmigaso// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigaso zhes bya ba ni thun mong ma
250b4(mdo 'grel): yin pa'i yon tan gyi rten yin no// // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'ong la gnas med cing mi dmig so// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / 'thab bral dang / dga'o ldan dang // 'phru
250b5(mdo 'grel): dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris+ya dang / tshungs pa mdun na 'don dang / tshangs 'khor dang / tshungs chen dang / 'og mon gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi 'od lnga gnas med cing mI dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
250b6(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigaso zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi don gyi go rim gyi rten yin no// // rab 'byor 'di lta ste
251a1(mdo 'grel): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyu 'od la gnas med cing mi mig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' na po shes rab kyi
251a2(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don gang yin pa'i
251a3(mdo 'grel): chos de dag kyang ldan pa ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/ gzugs myed pa dang / bstan du med pa dang / thogs pa myeng pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
251a4(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen pos ni/ rtog pa med pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi chags pa med pa nyid dang / yod par gyur pa ma yin pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams
251a5(mdo 'grel): ca rtog par bya'o zhes bya ba ni ye shes lhun gyis grub par 'jug pa'i rten yin no// // 'di dag gis ni sgrub pa'i rten bstan to// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das byung chu
251a6(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen pos ji ltar chos thams cad kyi yod par gyur pa ma yin pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad rtogs par 'gyi/ bcom
251b1(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ces bya ba ni/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang /
251b2(mdo 'grel): 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na tho ba med pa dang / thun mong pa dang / thun mong ma yin pa dag ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
251b3(mdo 'grel): chen pos kyang / chos de dag thams cad kyi yod par gyur pa ma yin pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos 'di dag rtogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa'i rang gi ngo bo yin no// /
251b4(mdo 'grel): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'ongs kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya ba ni phar shes pa dang / mar shes pa dang / dge sbyong du
251b5(mdo 'grel): shes pa dang / bram zer shes pa dang / rigs kyi rten pa la rim glor byed pa dang / spyan pa las byung ba'i bsnod rnams byu ba'i dngas po dang / tshug khrims las thung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / bsnyem pa las
251b6(mdo 'grel): bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / nyamasu blang ba dang ldan pa'i dngos po dang / thabs mkhas pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i 'du shes dgu ste/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang /
252a1(mdo 'grel): rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par bsngos pa pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par
252a2(mdo 'grel): mthor ba pa'i 'du shes dang / rus pa pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / 'jig rten pa'i mngon par
252a3(mdo 'grel): shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten pa'i rje su dran pa bcu ste/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rje su dran pa dang / chos rjesu dran pa dang / dge 'dun rje su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rje su dran pa
252a4(mdo 'grel): dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rje su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rje su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rje su dran pa dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos zhes brjod do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig
252a5(mdo 'grel): rten pa'i mi dge ba'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag ste/ 'di lta ste/ rab 'byor srog gcod pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o// ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod
252a6(mdo 'grel): pas log par g.yem pa dang / rdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / tshig rtsub mo dang / ngag 'khyal pa dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba dang / khro ba dang / khon du 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang /
252b1(mdo 'grel): rnam par 'tshe ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / nga rgyal dang / logs pa'i nga rgyal te/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i mi dge ba'i chos zhes brjod do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lung du ma bstan pa'i chos gang lags//
252b2(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lung du ma bstan pa'i lus kyi las dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i ngag gi las dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i yid kyi las dang / lung du ma bsten pa'i 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang / lung du ma bstan
252b3(mdo 'grel): papa'i dbang po lnga dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i skye mched drug dang / lung du ma bstan pa'o gzugs med pa dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams dang / rnam par smin pa thams cad de/ de dag ni lung du ma
252b4(mdo 'grel): bstan pa'i chos zhes brjod do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams bcwo brgyad dang / dge ba bcu'i
252b5(mdo 'grel): lus kyi lam dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug phye bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten pa'i chos gzhan gang / gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i chos gang dag yin pa
252b6(mdo 'grel): ste/ 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos zhes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba
253a1(mdo 'grel): bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar
253a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa dang / mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang / rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas
253a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi tingange 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / tshul bzhin yod la byed pa dang /
253a4(mdo 'grel): rnam par thar pa brgyad do// brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gzugs la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o// /
253a5(mdo 'grel): sdug par mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas na mkha' mtha' yas
253a6(mdo 'grel): so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du na mkha' mtha' yis skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha
253b1(mdo 'grel): yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad meng ngo snyam pas ci
253b2(mdo 'grel): yang med pa'i skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te
253b3(mdo 'grel): gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dgra por 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyud
253b4(mdo 'grel): pa ste/ 'di dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyi dben pa'i rtog pa dang bcas/ dpyod pa dang bcas/ dpon
253b5(mdo 'grel): pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongasu dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par
253b6(mdo 'grel): rtog pa med pa rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting 'dzin la skyes pa'i dga' bo dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes
254a1(mdo 'grel): bzhin du btang snyom su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan
254a2(mdo 'grel): gsum pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal ba yang med/ btang snyoms drang
254a3(mdo 'grel): dran pa yong su dag pI bsam gtan bzhi pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes
254a4(mdo 'grel): yid la mi byed pas na mkha' mtha' yas so snyam te/ na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par
254a5(mdo 'grel): shes pa mtha' yas so snyam pas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched nye bar bsgribs te gnas po dang / de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad med do snyam pas cung
254a6(mdo 'grel): zad med pa'i skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam po thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa
254b1(mdo 'grel): thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa ste/ 'di dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o// rang stong pa nyid
254b2(mdo 'grel): dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid spyong pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
254b3(mdo 'grel): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gang lugs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor phung po
254b4(mdo 'grel): lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams bco brgyad dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ste/ de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya'o// gsol pa/
254b5(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang
254b6(mdo 'grel): po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
255a1(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
255a2(mdo 'grel): 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / gzhan yang khams gsum par gtogs pa'i chos gang cung zad yod pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs
255a3(mdo 'grel): kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos shes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
255a4(mdo 'grel): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur pa mi mngon pa ste/ 'o lnga ste/ 'dod chags zad pe/ zhe sdang zad pra/ gti mug zad pa/ de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin
255a5(mdo 'grel): nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid/ chos nyid chos kyi dbyings/ chos gnas pa nyid/ chos nges pa nyid/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya
255a6(mdo 'grel): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thun mong gi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs meng pi snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa
255b1(mdo 'grel): snga drug ste/ de dag ni byis pa so so skye bo rnams dang thun mong gi chos zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thun mong ma lags pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs
255b2(mdo 'grel): kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni thun mong ma yin
255b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i chos zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ni rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la chags
255b4(mdo 'grel): par mi bya zhing / chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i tshul du rtogs par bya ba ni sgrub pa'i dmigs pa bstan po yin no// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
255b5(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' semasna dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba grong brjod pa ci'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la sems
255b6(mdo 'grel): can gyi phung po chen po dang sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog nyid du byed par 'gyur ba de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
256a1(mdo 'grel): chen po gang gi mchog nyid du byed par 'gyur pa sems can gyi phung po chen po dang / sems can gyi sde chen po de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po
256a2(mdo 'grel): dang / sems can gyi sde chen po zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sems bskyed pa'i/
256a3(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa'i dang / phyir m-i ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar dag ste/ rab 'byor de ni sems can gyi phung po chen po dang / sems can gyi sde chen po zhes bya ste/ byang
256a4(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de'i phul byed par 'gyuraro// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lte bu'o sems bskyed do// sems can gyi phung po chen po dang / sems can gyi sde chen po'i
256a5(mdo 'grel): mchog tu 'gyur bar bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du
256a6(mdo 'grel): bdag gis 'khor ba dpag tu med pa sems can thams cad kyi don du go cha bgos nas bdog pa thams cad yongasu btang bar bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o// bdag gi
256b1(mdo 'grel): sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis mya dran las bzla bar bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad yongasu mya ngan las bzlas kyang sems can gang yang yongasu mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba med de/ de tsats+tsha b+hIr
256b2(mdo 'grel): zhe na/ bdag gis chos thams cad skye ba med par rtogs par bya ba yin no// bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ma 'dres pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod par bya'o// bdag gis chos thams cad rje su rtogs
256b3(mdo 'grel): pa thams cad du spong ba la bslab par bya'o// bdag gis chos rnams kyi tshul gcig tu mngon par sgrub pa rtogs par bya'o// bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub par rtogs par bya ba'i don du chos rnams la bslab par bya'o//
256b4(mdo 'grel): bdag gis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon par sgrub pa rtogs pa'i don du chos rnams la bslab par bya'o// bdag gis bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / myangon par
256b5(mdo 'grel): shes pa mngon par sgrud pa rtogs par bya ba'i don du chos rnams la bslab par bya'o// bdag gis stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par
256b6(mdo 'grel): sgrub pa rtogs par bya ba'i don du chos rnams la bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/ rab 'byor 'di ni gang la gnas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi sde
257a1(mdo 'grel): chen po'i mchog nyid du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed par 'gyur ba rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du sems can dmyal ba
257a2(mdo 'grel): dang byol song gi skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can ji snyed cig gisde sdug bsngal gyi tshor po nyamasu myong bar 'gyur ba de dag gi don du sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de bdag gis nyam su myong bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed
257a3(mdo 'grel): do// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems bskyed par bya ba ni/ 'di ltar ji srod du/ sems can de dag phung po lhag ma med par yong su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du bdag gis sems can re re'i don du yang bskal pa bya
257a4(mdo 'grel): ba khrag khrog brgya stong mang por sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal nyam su myong bar bya'o snyam zhing tshul 'di nyid kyi sems can thams cad phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan lus
257a5(mdo 'grel): 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongs mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sems can thams cad kyi don du sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad nyam su myong bar byas te/ de nas gdod bdag gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/
257a6(mdo 'grel): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya steng du mas byang chub kyi tshogs bsags nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni gang gis
257b1(mdo 'grel): sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog nyid du byed par 'gyur ba rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems bskyed pa gang gis sem
257b2(mdo 'grel): can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur bar bya ba rlabs po che'i semasu bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che ni 'di yin te/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar gzung nas 'dod tshogs kyi sems mi
257b3(mdo 'grel): skyed/ zhe sdang gi sems mi skyed/ gti mug gi sems mi skyed/ gtso ba'i sems mi skyed/ nyan thos kyi sems dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyang mi skyed pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni gang gis sems can thams cad kyi mchog nyid
257b4(mdo 'grel): du byed kyang nges rlom sems mi byed pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi sprul ba'i sems dang ldan par bya ste/ de la byang chub
257b5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi skul ba nyid ni 'di yin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la byed cing de rlom sems mi byed pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni gang gis sems can thams cad kyi
257b6(mdo 'grel): mchog nyid du 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems skul ba'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o// de
258a1(mdo 'grel): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems ni 'di yin te/ sems can thams cad skyob cing sems can thams cad yongasu mi gtong ba gang yin pa des kyang rlom semasu 'gyur
258a2(mdo 'grel): ba med pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni gang la gnas na sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
258a3(mdo 'grel): phan pa dang / bde ba'i semasaso// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni chos la dge' ba dang / chos la kun dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o// de la chos gang zhe na/ chos thams cad dbyer med pa
258a4(mdo 'grel): gang yin pa ste/ 'di ni chos shes bya'o// de la chos la dga' ba gang zhe na/ chos la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa ste/ 'di ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o// de la chos la kun dga' ba gang zhe na/ chos sgom zhing mong du byed pa
258a5(mdo 'grel): gang yin pa ste/ 'di ni chos la kun dga' ba zhes bya'o// de la chos la dga' ba dang / kun dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/ mngon par sbyor ba ste/ 'di ni chos la dga' ba dang / chos la kun dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la/
258a6(mdo 'grel): brtson pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas sems can gyi phung po chen po dang / sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog nyid du 'gyur bor de mi
258b1(mdo 'grel): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
258b2(mdo 'grel): pa nyid kyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po dang / sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog tu 'gyur bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
258b3(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams dang / sngo so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje
258b4(mdo 'grel): chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mya 'dres po bco brgyad la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po dang / sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog tu 'gyur par mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
258b5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i tinge 'dzin la gnas/ nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas/ rnam par grol zhing gros pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar la
258b6(mdo 'grel): gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po dang / sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog nyid du 'gyur bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byas te/ rab 'byor de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
259a1(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ chos 'di dag la gnas te/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog nyid du 'gyur bar bya ba yin no// des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
259a2(mdo 'grel): po zhes brjod do zhes bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad kyi mchog nyid du sems pa'i sems chen po nyid do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du/
259a3(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spob so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes brjod pa la khyod spobs par byos
259a4(mdo 'grel): shig/ DAshA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba dang / sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / skye ba por lta ba dang / gso bar blta ba dang / skyes bur lta ba dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu
259a5(mdo 'grel): dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba por lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / yod par lta ba dang / med par lta ba dang / phung por lta ba dang / kham su lta ba dang / skye mched du lta ba dang /
259a6(mdo 'grel): rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar lta ba dang / pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su lta ba dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs par lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta ba dang / sems
259b1(mdo 'grel): can yongasasu smin par lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu sbyong bar lta ba dang / byang chub rnam par rtogs par lta ba dang / sangs rgyas su lnga pa dang / chos su lta ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lho bskor bar lta ba
259b2(mdo 'grel): rnams te/ lte ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu spang ba'i slad du/ sems can rnams la chos ston par bgyid kyang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bgyid de/ de'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas
