259b3(mdo 'grel): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzugasu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
259b4(mdo 'grel): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur pa nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du lnga bar 'gyur pa yin/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
259b5(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / thabs mi mkhas pas gzugasu dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul
259b6(mdo 'grel): gyis lta ba bskyed de/ de bzhin du rgya cher skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar so so ba dang / bsdus pa'i bar du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do// de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
260a1(mdo 'grel): rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
260a2(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / yi ge rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnamasu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do// rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis/
260a3(mdo 'grel): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang /
260a4(mdo 'grel): so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du gnas shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do// tshe dang ldan pa rab
260a5(mdo 'grel): 'byor de'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugasu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du lta bar
260a6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lta ba'i rnam pa de dag spang ba'i phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to zhes bya ba ni spong ba chen
260b1(mdo 'grel): po nyid do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spob so// bcom ldan 'das
260b2(mdo 'grel): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyis spobs pa bskyed cig/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong
260b3(mdo 'grel): ma lags pa'i sems/ zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum du ma gtogs pa'i sems gang lags pa de la yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du/ chags pa ma mchis pa de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
260b4(mdo 'grel): chen po zhes bgyi ba'i grangasu mchi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sems de ni sems ma lags te/ des na de la chags pa ma mchis so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// /
260b5(mdo 'grel): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa sems gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang
260b6(mdo 'grel): ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar gzung ste/ chos 'ga' yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag par yang dag par rje su ma mthong ngo // 'phel ba 'am/ 'grib pa
261a1(mdo 'grel): 'am/ 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang lnga skye ba med cing 'gug pa med pa dang / 'phel bu med cing 'grig
261a2(mdo 'grel): pa med pa dang / 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de la nyan thos kyi sems med do// rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub
261a3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems so// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang khyod kyis 'di skad du
261a4(mdo 'grel): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa med pa khong du chud pa med pa'i sems de la yang chags pa med do zhes gang smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs chags pa med pa yin
261a5(mdo 'grel): nam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med pa yin na na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chags pa med pa yin nam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de
261a6(mdo 'grel): de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang chags pa med pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med pa'o// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o bar yang chag pa
261b1(mdo 'grel): med pa'o// bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yang chags pa med pa'o// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang chags pa med pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
261b2(mdo 'grel): brgyad kyi bar yang chags pa med pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bur yang chags pa med pa'o// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de yang zag pa med
261b3(mdo 'grel): cing khongasu chud pa med pa zhes bya ba gang smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongasu ma gtogs pa yin nam/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
261b4(mdo 'grel): kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khyong su ma gtogs pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni de bzhin to//
261b5(mdo 'grel): byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongasu chud pa med do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongasu
261b6(mdo 'grel): chud pa med do// sangs rgyus bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khong du chud pa med do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar yin na/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong
262a1(mdo 'grel): nyid kyi phyir zug pa med cing khongasu ma gtogs pa yin nam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongasu ma gtogs pa
262a2(mdo 'grel): yin nam+b+ha/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bAr ya
262a3(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs chud pa med pa yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lci bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs chud pa med pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis
262a4(mdo 'grel): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji skad smras pa de bzhin to// gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongasu chud pa myed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang
262a5(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongasu chud pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar yang rung bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongasu chud pa med do// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
262a6(mdo 'grel): gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du sems med pa'i phyir sems de la yang chags pa med do zhes smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyang gzugs med pa la chags pa med pa yin nam/ tshor ba yang tshor ba med pa la ma/
262b1(mdo 'grel): med pa yin nam/ 'du shes kyang 'du shes med pa la chags pa med pa yin nam/ 'du byed rnams kyang 'du byed med pa la chags pa med pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa yang rnam par shes pa med pa la chags pa med pa yin nam/
262b2(mdo 'grel): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang byang chub kyi phyog ste chos rnams med pa la chags pa med pa yin nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med pa la chags pa med pa
262b3(mdo 'grel): yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bur yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med pa la chags pa med pa yin nam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs kyang gzugs
262b4(mdo 'grel): med pa la chags pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang / rnam par shes pa med pa la chags pa med do// de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba so so ba dang /
262b5(mdo 'grel): bsdus pa rnams dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par shes pa yang rnam par shes pa med pa la chags pa med do// pha rol tu phyin pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / b+h+ya
262b6(mdo 'grel): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med pa la chags pa med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri
263a1(mdo 'grel): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun
263a2(mdo 'grel): mong ma yin pa'i sems des kyang chos thams cad la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom semasu 'gyur ba med mngon par chags par 'gyur ba med de/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o zhes bya ba
263a3(mdo 'grel): ni rtogs pa chen po nyid do 'di dag gis ni sgrub pa'i ched du bya ba bstan to// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du
263a4(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spob so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ gang po khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig/ gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni go cha chen
263a5(mdo 'grel): po bgos pa'i sem+b+ha pan lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can lags la/ de ni theg pa chen por yang dag par gnas pa'i sems can lags te/ de'i skad du byang chub
263a6(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems
263b1(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byang chub kyi don du spyod pa na sems can nyung zad nyi tshe zhig gi don du sbyin pa'i/
263b2(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sbyin pa yongasu gtong ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas sbyin pa yongasu gtong ngo // de bzhin du byang chub kyi don du spyod pa ni
263b3(mdo 'grel): sems can nyi tshe ba zhig gi don du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
263b4(mdo 'grel): gnas shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang sems can thams cad kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par byed do// byang chub sems dpa'
263b5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig ni phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongasu mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mi bya'o zhe 'am
263b6(mdo 'grel): sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod par bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o zhes sems can yong su bcad pas go cha mi gyon gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can
264a1(mdo 'grel): thams cad kyi don du go cha chen po gyon to// de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can 'di dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// /
264a2(mdo 'grel): bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/
264a3(mdo 'grel): sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// de bzhin du bdag gis kyang byang chub kyi chos rnams dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom par bya//
264a4(mdo 'grel): gzhan yang de dag la dgod par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par bya'o// sems can tham
264a5(mdo 'grel): cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyar bur bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskyed do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos zhes bya ba ni bsgrub
264a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i rang gi ngo bo yin no// // bam po bcu bzhi po// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa gang yongasu gtong ba de dag
264b1(mdo 'grel): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas yongasu gtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can tham cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ste/ 'di ni byang chub
264b2(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
264b3(mdo 'grel): kyikyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yang la bya ba so sbyin pa yong su gtong zhing / nyan thos dang / reng sangs rgyas kyi sa yid lo byed pa spong ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
264b4(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po'o shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongasu gtong ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
264b5(mdo 'grel): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa gtong ba na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rtog pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
264b6(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongasu gtong ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
265a1(mdo 'grel): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus mi gtong ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yong su gtong ba'i
265a2(mdo 'grel): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa yongasu gtong ba ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams
265a3(mdo 'grel): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid lnga bya byas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing / de la dmyigs pa gcig pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems
265a4(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongasasu gtong ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes ra
265a5(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yong su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ sbyin pa po yang mi dmigs/ len pa po yang mi
265a6(mdo 'grel): dmigs/ smyon par bya ba yang mi dmigs pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yong su gtong ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa
265b1(mdo 'grel): shA ri'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas pha rol tu phyin pa de dag la mtshan mar mi byed pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
265b2(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i go cha chen po bgos par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po'i go cha ste dang po'o// // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
265b3(mdo 'grel): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa gang yongasu gtong ba de dag sems can thams cad deng thun mongs du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
265b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yong su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byung
265b5(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang mos pa ni mi skyed na/ so so'i skye
265b6(mdo 'grel): bo'i sa la lta smos kyang ci smos pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
266a1(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya byas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rtog pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
266a2(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
266a3(mdo 'grel): yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brtson 'grus nyams par myi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
266a4(mdo 'grel): pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing gnas pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang /
266a5(mdo 'grel): rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi go mi 'byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasasu bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
266a6(mdo 'grel): chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
266b1(mdo 'grel): yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing / tshul khrims des rlom semasu mi byed de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshul brims de yang mi
266b2(mdo 'grel): dmigs shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dupa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha
266b3(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la da ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad
266b4(mdo 'grel): yongasu 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug po'i go cha ste gnyis pa'o// // tshe dang ldan pa kA ro'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
266b5(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'o yid la bya bas sbyin pa gtong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can sa lus cad dang thun med du kris shing / bla na med pa yang
266b6(mdo 'grel): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri bu gzhan yang / byang chub sems
267a1(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul
267a2(mdo 'grel): khrims yongasu bsrung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
267a3(mdo 'grel): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad
267a4(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa dang / rtog pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa
267a5(mdo 'grel): shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i
267a6(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan
267b1(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems rtse
267b2(mdo 'grel): gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan
267b3(mdo 'grel): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas
267b4(mdo 'grel): tebazod pa des rlom semasu mi byed cing / bzod pa mi dmigs pa 'dri ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub
267b5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongasu 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug
267b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i go cha ste gsum pa'o// // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
268a1(mdo 'grel): yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongasu gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang
268a2(mdo 'grel): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang
268a3(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul
268a4(mdo 'grel): khroms bsrung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can dang thun mong du byas te/ bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
268a5(mdo 'grel): la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam thams cad
268a6(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bos brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing // chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rtog pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
268b1(mdo 'grel): byin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad
268b2(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bras brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can thams cad kyi don du brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed cing / brtun mi nges pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
268b3(mdo 'grel): po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
268b4(mdo 'grel): mA yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
268b5(mdo 'grel): byin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa
268b6(mdo 'grel): yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ brtson 'grus nges rlom semasu mi byed cing / brtson 'grus de yang mi dmigs
269a1(mdo 'grel): te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
269a2(mdo 'grel): byin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongasu 'dzin te/
269a3(mdo 'grel): de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug po'i go cha ste bzhi pa'o// // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
269a4(mdo 'grel): pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongasu gtong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun
269a5(mdo 'grel): mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
269a6(mdo 'grel): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'atshon po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
269b1(mdo 'grel): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims bsrung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun myong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasasu bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
269b2(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang
269b3(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yod la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa yongasu bsgom ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par
269b4(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasasu bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal
269b5(mdo 'grel): chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yod la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya bas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stod cing / brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed de// de'i dge ba'i
269b6(mdo 'grel): rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha
270a1(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems
270a2(mdo 'grel): rtse gcig tu byed de/ de la dmyigs pa cig pa'i phyir nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnams kyi go mi 'byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs
270a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsum gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa'
270a4(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par byed na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
270a5(mdo 'grel): ldan pa'i yid la byed pas/ chos thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam po'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bsam gtan des kyang rlom semasu mi byed cing bsam gtan de yang mi dmyigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun
270a6(mdo 'grel): mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa
270b1(mdo 'grel): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsum gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongasasu 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o// zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan gyi pha
270b2(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa drug po'i go cha ste lnga pa'o// // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
270b3(mdo 'grel): bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas sbyin pa yongasu gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang
270b4(mdo 'grel): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhon yang byang chub sems
270b5(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas mu yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims yongasu
270b6(mdo 'grel): bsrung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
271a1(mdo 'grel): spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
271a2(mdo 'grel): yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa mos shing rtog ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang
271a3(mdo 'grel): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
271a4(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus nyams
271a5(mdo 'grel): pAr mi byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
271a6(mdo 'grel): phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan
271b1(mdo 'grel): yid la bya bsgyu ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogus
271b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
271b3(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par byed de/ de yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yod la byed pas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
271b4(mdo 'grel): la byed pas pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang po chos thams cad la sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / brag cha dang / gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang snrums
271b5(mdo 'grel): can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasasu bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/
271b6(mdo 'grel): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed/ ming migra pa
272a1(mdo 'grel): de ltar na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ go cha chen po bgos pa 'gyur ba yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems
272a2(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa re res gnas nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug po'i go cha ste drug pa'o// // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
272a3(mdo 'grel): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug par byed kyang bsam gtan rnams kyi ro myang bar mi byed/ de dag gis 'phrog par yang mi 'gyur te/ de dag gi dbang gis skye ba
272a4(mdo 'grel): yang ma yin/ de bzhin du tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa la snyoms par 'jug par byed kyang de dag gi ro myang bar mi byed / te ngag gis 'phrog par yang mi 'gyur/ de dag gi dbang gis skye ba yang ma yin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa
272a5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang /
272a6(mdo 'grel): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mthong bas gnas kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byed pa ma yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
272b1(mdo 'grel): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gro cha chen po bgos pa des na sems dpa' chen po zhes brjod do// tshe dang ldan
272b2(mdo 'grel): pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha chen po bgos pa la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing yongasu sgrogs pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge
272b3(mdo 'grel): mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongasu smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad
272b4(mdo 'grel): cing dbyangs rje su sgrog go zhes bya ba ni drug pa'i go cha'i mjug bsdu bu'o// go cha'i sgrub pa bstan zin to// // shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
272b5(mdo 'grel): theg pa chen po lnga yang dag par 'jug pa dang / theg pa chen po la 'dzeg par 'gyur pa yin/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
272b6(mdo 'grel): cing 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyi dben pa rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bzhin du bsam
273a1(mdo 'grel): gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bzhin du na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes
273a2(mdo 'grel): med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa ste/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'o// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i
273a3(mdo 'grel): snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan mas mnyam par 'jog cing ldang ba na dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su
273a4(mdo 'grel): bsngo bar byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
273a5(mdo 'grel): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang brjod par bya'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ bsam gtan bzhi la mnyam par 'jog par byed/ gzugs med
273a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug par byed/ gong gi tshe byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po bsam gton 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag gis gnas shing //
273b1(mdo 'grel): de bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa na/ nA mkha'i rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma yid lta byed pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod cing dge ba'i rtsa
273b2(mdo 'grel): bapa de dang gzhan yang rnam pa thams tshad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngo bar byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems
273b3(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni/ theg pa chen po la rab tu zhugs pa yin no// sems can rnams
273b4(mdo 'grel): kyang yong su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldang ba'i 'jug pa yin no// / shA ri'i bu gzhan
273b5(mdo 'grel): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yang la bya bas sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir chos bsten par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
273b6(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang / tshing med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
274a1(mdo 'grel): par 'jug pa de dag la mnyam par gzhag cing rnam par ldang yang 'di lta ste/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems sam/ sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
274a2(mdo 'grel): po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'o// num byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dpo ldan pa'i yang la bya bas bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs
274a3(mdo 'grel): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi gnas pa na 'di snyam ste/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to snyam du sems shing yid la byed pa de dag la 'dod pa dang / bzod pa dang / nye bar rtog pa
274a4(mdo 'grel): pa dang / rtogs pa dang / nges par sems par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
274a5(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa'i yid la byA bas bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
274a6(mdo 'grel): nyid kyi phyir/ brtson 'grus mi gtong ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
274b1(mdo 'grel): yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa la snyems par 'jug kyang / mi dmigs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
274b2(mdo 'grel): chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'i yan lag rnams la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal
274b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtogs kyang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med
274b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing de dag gis rlom semasu mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ni/ byang chub sems
274b5(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi 'jug pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa
274b6(mdo 'grel): chen po ni rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa meng pa bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams
275a1(mdo 'grel): cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom par byed pa 'di ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
275a2(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni/ 'phags pa'i lam la 'jug pa'o// // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byams pa dang /
275a3(mdo 'grel): ldan pa sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ kho na med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ sgrim pa med la/ gnod pa med pa/ thams cad du song ba shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig gi 'jig rten chos kyi
275a4(mdo 'grel): dbyings kyis klas pa/ namakha'i mthus gtugs pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten khyab par byas shing / nye bar bsgrubs nas gnas pa nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jog rten gyi khams kyi bur du khyab par byas
275a5(mdo 'grel): shing nye bar bsgrubs nas gnas so// de snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' bya dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ mo gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla
275a6(mdo 'grel): med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ thams can du song ba shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig gi 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten
275b1(mdo 'grel): khyab par byas shing / nye bar bsgrubs nas gnas pa nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi bar du khyab par byas shing nye bar bsgrubs nas gnas so// tshe dang ldan pA shA ri'i bu gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
275b2(mdo 'grel): rnon po byams pA'i tinge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog cing bad+mag gis sems can thams cad yod+d+ha su bsgrub par bya'o zhes de la gzhol bar byed/ snying rje'i ting 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog tsang / snrums can rnams la
275b3(mdo 'grel): snying rje bo dang / snying brtse ba la gzhol bar byed/ dga' ba'i tingange 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog cing / bdag nyid kyi sems can dga' bur bya'o zhes sems can rnams la gzhol bar byed/ btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la
275b4(mdo 'grel): mnyam par 'jog cing / sems can rnams zag pa zad pa la rab tu gzhol bar byed de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems
275b5(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po byasam gAtan dang / tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan mr-i la mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam pa ldan yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba ma gtogs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs
275b6(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi sar yong su mi bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
276a1(mdo 'grel): chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag 'dres par rnam par spyod cing / sna gnyis po nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'dod pa mi skyed kyi/ rnam
276a2(mdo 'grel): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bzod pa dang / 'dod pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa
276a3(mdo 'grel): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i don du brtson 'grus mi gtong bas rnam par spyod pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
276a4(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byasam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs medo pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la yang
276a5(mdo 'grel): mnyam par 'jog la/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs meng pa'o snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye zhing / de dag gi ro myong bar byed pa yang med la/ de dag gis 'phrogs par yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni/ byang chub
276a6(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan
276b1(mdo 'grel): dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la yang mnyam par 'jog cing / rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam
276b2(mdo 'grel): pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par 'jug par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshad
276b3(mdo 'grel): med pa rnams la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni tshad med pa la 'jug pa'o// // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
276b4(mdo 'grel): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med
276b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yon pa gang yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
276b6(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ chos thams cad la sems rnam par g.yeng ba med par mnyam par bzhag pa'i shes pa gang yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por
277a1(mdo 'grel): theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug/ mi rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag dang /
277a2(mdo 'grel): bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / ma zhi ba zhes bya ba dang / stong pa dang / mi stong pa dang / mtshan ma yod pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa yod pa dang / smon pa med ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
277a3(mdo 'grel): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thog pa chen po ni gang 'das pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jig/ ma 'ongs pa
277a4(mdo 'grel): dang / da ltar gyi dus la shes pa 'jug par mi byed de/ de gsuM po 'ogatsu dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes pa mi 'jug pa 'di ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan
277a5(mdo 'grel): pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'dod pa'i kham su shes pa mi 'jug par mi byed/ gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i kham su shes pa 'jug par mi byed de/ 'dod pa dang
277a6(mdo 'grel): gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes pa 'jug pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang
277b1(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang / zag pa dang bcas dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos la shes pa 'jug par
277b2(mdo 'grel): mi byed de/ de 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mi shes pa yang med/ zag pa dang bcad pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes
277b3(mdo 'grel): pa mi 'jug pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa la sbyor ba'i 'jug pa'o// / shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa glang po ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems
277b4(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la zhugs pa zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
277b5(mdo 'grel): phyin pa la 'dzeg kyang / des sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs te/ sbyin pa po dang / len pa po dang / sbyin pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dmig su med pa de lta na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
277b6(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po theg pa chen po lo 'dzeg pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
278a1(mdo 'grel): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dzeg kyang de mi dmigs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dzeg kyang des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmig so//
278a2(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs pa'i yid la byed pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dmig su med pa de ltar na tshe dang ldan po shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la 'dzeg pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'khor
278a3(mdo 'grel): gsum yongasu dag pa la 'jug pa'o// // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas sgom pa rnam par
278a4(mdo 'grel): gzhig pa'i don du/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom par byed de/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la 'dzeg pa zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bu
278a5(mdo 'grel): gzhan yang byang chubo sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa ma 'dres pas sgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i don du stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i
278a6(mdo 'grel): ting nge 'dzin rnams de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom par byed de/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la 'jig pa zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
278b1(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba pa ma 'dres pas sgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
278b2(mdo 'grel): bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom par byed de/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la 'dzeg pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan
278b3(mdo 'grel): pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa' dmig su med pa'i phyir/ 'di ni tha snyad tsam de/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o zhes bya ba de ltar shes so// gzugasu dmig
278b4(mdo 'grel): su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya bar shes so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmig su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par shes
278b5(mdo 'grel): pa zhes bya'o zhes bya bar de ltar shes so// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dmigasu med pa'i phyir/ 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya bar shes so// sbyin
278b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmig su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar de ltar shes so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
279a1(mdo 'grel): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bya dmig su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar
279a2(mdo 'grel): shes so// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dmig su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tho snyad tsam+b+ha ste/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams zhes bya bar shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi
279a3(mdo 'grel): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmig su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya bar shes so// nang stong pa nyid
279a4(mdo 'grel): dmyig su med pa'i phyir/ 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar shes so// phyi stong pa nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lnga ste phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar shes so// phyi nang stong pa nyid
279a5(mdo 'grel): dmigs su myed pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar shes so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmig su myed pa'i phyir/ 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ dngos po
279a6(mdo 'grel): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar shes so// de bzhin nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir 'a'odi ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin nyid ces bya bar shes so// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin
279b1(mdo 'grel): nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos nges pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dmig su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya bar shes so// byang
279b2(mdo 'grel): chub dmig su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub ces bya bar shes so// sangs rgyas dam gsu med pa'i phyir/ 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lnga ste/ sangs rgyas dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di ni tha snyad tsom
279b3(mdo 'grel): ste/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas zhes bya bar yang dag par shes te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la 'dzeg pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni ched du bya ba la 'jug pa'o// /
279b4(mdo 'grel): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nye bar bzung ste/ snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du mngon par shes pa thams cad yongasasu rdzogs pa'i phyir na
279b5(mdo 'grel): sems can yongasu smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas glang la mchod pa dang bkur sti byar 'os pa'i mchod pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/
279b6(mdo 'grel): ri mor byed/ mchod par byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las kyang chos nyan to// 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po 'di nyid do// de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa de la 'dzeg nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi
280a1(mdo 'grel): zhing du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par byed/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang / de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung / sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung / sangs
280a2(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung ngo // de gnyis su med pa'i sa la gnas shing / lus ji lta bus sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i mthu yod pa de lta bu'i lus ched du bsams shing yongasu 'dzin to// de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
280a3(mdo 'grel): pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par ma gyur gyi bar du theg pa chen po de dang nam yang mi 'bral lo zhes bya ba ni mngon par shes pa la 'jug pa'o// // des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob nas kyang / nyan thos
280a4(mdo 'grel): dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am tsi dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mI dang mi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskor bar mi
280a5(mdo 'grel): nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ shur phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye mu snyed dag na sangs rgyas
280a6(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa mchog la
280b1(mdo 'grel): 'dzegs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob bo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangasu brjod pa mdzad do// de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang /
280b2(mdo 'grel): byang sh+tsar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byung dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag nA/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon
280b3(mdo 'grel): ton brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la 'dzegs nas rnam pa thams cad
280b4(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa nyid thob bo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangasu brjod pa mdzad do// tshe dang ldan pa shU ri'i bu de wA rA na byang chub sems dpa' sems
280b5(mdo 'grel): dpa'i chen po theg pa chen po la 'dzegs pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug pa'o// // 'di dag gis ni 'jug pa'i sgrub pa bstan to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
280b6(mdo 'grel): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos pa/ go cha chen po bgos pa zhes brjod pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos zhes bgyi ba lags/ de skad
281a1(mdo 'grel): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyisna tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor lnga 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'dri la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos theg pa chen po'i go cha 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa
281a2(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha dang / shes rab kyi pha
281a3(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi go cha bgos/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i go cha
281a4(mdo 'grel): bgros/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa drang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi go cha bgos/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
281a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i go cha 'gro ste/ mngon par shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyud kyi go cha bgos/ rnam pa thams cad
281a6(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas rgyas par bkang ste/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
281b1(mdo 'grel): snang bas rgyas par 'gengaso// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shA ra dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byung dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
281b2(mdo 'grel): snying snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam par 'gyur pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu rab tu
281b3(mdo 'grel): bskyod do// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byung phyogs dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byung dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gAng+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam par 'gyur ba
281b4(mdo 'grel): rab tu bskyod do// des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas shing sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal rab tu bcil nas/ de
281b5(mdo 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang /
281b6(mdo 'grel): bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs
282a1(mdo 'grel): shing 'tsho skyong ba da / de dag tu skye ste/ lha dang mi'i skye ba yongasu 'dzin to// de bzhin du byol song gi skye gnas bA sau rnaMs dang / grwa shin rje 'dzi sten hI so/ de gnas/ par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / 'jig rten de
282a2(mdo 'grel): ngag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang / gang nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye ste/ lha dang mi'i skye ba yongasu 'dzin to// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po
282a3(mdo 'grel): 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du sems can dmyal ba pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag cig mngon par sprul la/ de
282a4(mdo 'grel): ltar mngon par sprul nas ngan song gi sems can de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra sgrogs par gyur te/ de nas sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems can dmyal
282a5(mdo 'grel): ba dang / byol seng gi skye gnas nas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dri dang de dag las rnam par langs par gyur na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po dang / sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang /
282a6(mdo 'grel): sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par bslang ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchiso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de
282b1(mdo 'grel): bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams ngan song gsum las yongasu dkrol yang sems can gang yang yongasu grol bar
282b2(mdo 'grel): byas pa med do// dri ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyi de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po byagros zhes bya'o//
282b3(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba ni snying rje'i tshogs so// / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
282b4(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul par byed do// de ltar bai DUr+ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul nas/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprul par byed do// de ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i bkod
282b5(mdo 'grel): pa mngon par sprul nas/ zos 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi sbyin pa byed do// skom 'dod pa rnams la skyom/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa/ gos 'dod pa rnams gos/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog/ phreng ba 'dod
282b6(mdo 'grel): pa rnams la phreng ba/ spos 'dod pa rnams la spos/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la mal cha/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim 'tshe ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams la yo byad/
283a1(mdo 'grel): nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la rtsi dang yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do// nor bu dang / mA tig dang / b+hai DUr+yAr+ya dang / man shel dang / b+hu ru dang / gser dang dngul 'dod pa rnams lA n+dor bu dang / mu tig
283a2(mdo 'grel): dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / b+hu ru dang / gser dang dngul gyi sbyin pa byed cing / mi'i yo byad ga tsi yang rung ba'i bor du sbyin par byed de/ des de ltar zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang
283a3(mdo 'grel): rung ba'i bor du byin nas/ sems can de dag la chos ston pa ni 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston to// sems can de dag gis kyang chos bstan pa de thos nas bla na med pa yang dag byar
283a4(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyuraro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po
283a5(mdo 'grel): che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/
283a6(mdo 'grel): sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu mo'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas po nges/ sems can gang la yang ci yang byon pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de bzhin
283b1(mdo 'grel): du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor los sgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin yang / sems can gud la yang ci yang
283b2(mdo 'grel): byin pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po
283b3(mdo 'grel): byugos pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa'i tshig so// // rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing ched du bsams te skye ba yongasasu bzung bas 'khor
283b4(mdo 'grel): los sgyur ba'i rigasu skye zhing 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas/ sems can+da rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lAm la rab tu 'god do// bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
283b5(mdo 'grel): 'jug pa bzhi dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i bar dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la
283b6(mdo 'grel): sems can rab tu 'god de/ sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du/ chos bstan pa de dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab
284a1(mdo 'grel): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bya mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig
284a2(mdo 'grel): mngon par sprul te/ sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar la bkod na/ rab 'byor du la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan
284a3(mdo 'grel): po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa des sems can gang yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkrod pa yod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de po nI ma mchi so// /
284a4(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rkyen pos sems can tshad meng+ga grangs med pa/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
284a5(mdo 'grel): 'dres pa bco brgyud kyi bar la bkod kyang / sems can gung yong de dag la bkod pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyirar+ya zhe na/ dri sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor
284a6(mdo 'grel): de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims kyi tshogaso// // bam po bco lnga pa// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
284b1(mdo 'grel): chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing 'jog la rab tu 'grod do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
284b2(mdo 'grel): la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing 'jog la rab tu 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ 'di
284b3(mdo 'grel): ltar go cha gyon te/ brgya la sems can thams cad bdag la rdo dang / dbyig pa dang / khu tshur gyis brdeg cing mtshon gyis 'debs kyang de la bdag gis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam yang bskyeng bar mi bya zhing sems can
284b4(mdo 'grel): thams cad kyang bzod pa de 'dra ba la rab tu dgod par bya'o snyam mo// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'jug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs
284b5(mdo 'grel): kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar zhing gzhog lnga rab tu 'grod pa byas na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems
284b6(mdo 'grel): can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sem
285a1(mdo 'grel): can tshad med grangs med pa de snyed dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar
285a2(mdo 'grel): bzung nas/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni bzod pa'i tshog so// // rab 'byor gzhan yang
285a3(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sbyor zhing gzhog la rab tu 'god do// rab 'byor ji
285a4(mdo 'grel): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sbyor ba dang / gzhog la rab tu 'god pa yin zhe na/
285a5(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ sems can thams cad lus dang sems kyi smon 'grus la yang dag par sbyor zhing gzhog la ra
285a6(mdo 'grel): tu'agong ngo // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mekhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon
285b1(mdo 'grel): par sprul te/ lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa yod
285b2(mdo 'grel): ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshang med grangs med pa de snyed pa de dag lus
285b3(mdo 'grel): dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod kyang / lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor
285b4(mdo 'grel): de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o na byang ni sngon 'grus kyi tshogs so// // rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byasam gtan gyi pha
285b5(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sras can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa liM yang dag par sbyor zhing gzhog la rab tu 'god do// rab 'byor ji ltar nr-i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi
285b6(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing gzhog la/ rab tu 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams
286a1(mdo 'grel): cad kyi chos nyid mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing / chos gang la yang rnam par g.yeng ba 'am rnam par mi g.yeng bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin du sems
286a2(mdo 'grel): can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sbyor zhing gzhog pa dang rab tu 'god pa byed de/ de ltar yang dag par sbyar ba rnams kyang nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
286a3(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'a bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas po zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi
286a4(mdo 'grel): mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan
286a5(mdo 'grel): du mkhas pa des sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
286a6(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad bsal gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye
286b1(mdo 'grel): bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan gyi tshogs so// // rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
286b2(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sbyor zhing gzhog la rab tu 'god do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems
286b3(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sbyor ba dang / gzhog pa rab tu 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems
286b4(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang yang tshu rol tam/ pha rol tu mi dmigs te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gan
286b5(mdo 'grel): pa yin te/ de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sbyor zhing gzhog la rab tu 'god do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu
